V03vinsutru:17_0: Vin_1.2 / sarvasmin* sannipatite saṃghe kṛtedaṃ veṣaṃ nipatya pragṛhītāñjalim utkuṭusthaṃ
V03vinsutru:17_1: vṛddhāntaṃ yācivantaṃ trir jñapticaturthena karmaṇā saha pravrajyopasaṃpadāv upanayeyur iti purākalpaḥ /
V03vinsutru:18: Vin_1.3 / niśritasya kañcid bhikṣuṃ tatropādhyāyatayā pravrajyopasampadau /
V03vinsutru:23: Vin_1.8 / svayam upāsakatām upanīyārocakāya saṃghasyārpayet* bhikṣave /
V03vinsutru:24: Vin_1.9 / kañcit pariśuddhya tīti pṛṣṭvā śuddham ā[1b3]rocayet* /
V03vinsutru:38: Vin_1.23 / kañcit pariśuddhyatīti pṛṣṭvā śuddham upanayet* /
V03vinsutru:42: Vin_1.27 / abhyupagatāv u[1b5]pādhyāyasya yājñāyāṃ tad udbhūti /
V03vinsutru:43: Vin_1.28 / āvṛttau tṛtīye ṅśe ntyāyāṃ vṛttatvaṃ /
V03vinsutru:51: Vin_1.36 / nānuktvā sahitam arthahetor nāma gṛhnāmīty upādhyāyanāma gṛhnīyāt*
V03vinsutru:55: Vin_1.38 / upādhyāyatāyām unmukhībhūtaḥ karmakārakam adhīcched raho nuśāsakañ ca bhikṣuṃ /
V03vinsutru:57: Vin_1.40 / sa svayam enaṃ tricīvaram adhiṣṭhāpayet* /
V03vinsutru:61: Vin_1.42 / supātram ity anevaṃ brūyuḥ sarve /
V03vinsutru:62: Vin_1.43 / apakasite ka ity ākhyāpya raha nuśāsakam utsāhya karmakārakaḥ saṃghaṃ yenam anujñā..payet* /
V03vinsutru:64: Vin_1.45 / tiṣṭha mā śabditā gamiṣyasīty enam uktvā samanuśiṣṭa iti saṃghāya pariśuddhiṃ nivedya kim āgacchatv ity āgamanaṃ pṛcchet* /
V03vinsutru:74: Vin_1.55 / hemantito graismiko vārṣiko mitavārṣik. dīrghavārṣika iti /
V03vinsutru:82: Vin_1.63 / sa[m*]pannatāṃ samyagtayā ca prepsitasyotgrāhya śīlasāmānyagatatārāgaṇe niyuñjīt* /
V03vinsutru:91: Vin_1.70 // nānavalokya niḥśrayaṃ niḥśritaḥ kāraṇīyaṃ kuryāt* /
V03vinsutru:93: Vin_1.72 / dantakāṣṭhavisarjanaṃ sopavicāre vihāre cetyam abhivandanaṃ /
V03vinsutru:94_0: Vin_1.73 / ekānnaṃ pañcāśavyāmaparyantād vihārato gamanaṃ [2a5] pātracīvarakarmaṇo
V03vinsutru:95: Vin_1.74 / praṇidhātukāme saṃghe ho vata saṃgho syedaṃ praṇidhikarma na kuryād iti /
V03vinsutru:97: Vin_1.76 / parivāsamūlaparivāsamānāpy amūlamānāpy āvartaṇārthini niḥśraye ho vata saṃghasya parivāsādi catuṣkaṃ dadyād ā[2a6]bṛhet iti /
V03vinsutru:98: Vin_1.77 / so py etad asmai kuryād utsṛjyāvalokanaṃ /
V03vinsutru:123: Vin_1.101 / cared a[2b3]niḥśritaḥ pañcavarṣaḥ paścimasamayogena samanvitajanapadacārikaṃ /
V03vinsutru:127: Vin_1.103 / māsi tīrthya iti pravrajyārtham upasaṃkrāntaṃ pṛcched upasampādakāś ca /
V03vinsutru:128: Vin_1.104 / nānārādhitacittam utsṛjya śākyam āgneyañ ca jaṭilaṃ tīrthyaṃ pravrajayeyur upasaṃpādayeyur vā kṛte tattīrthyānārādhitāditīrthyānta[ra]varjam* /
V03vinsutru:129: Vin_1.105 / ratnānāṃ varṇasya [2b4] tīrthyānām avarṇasya bhūtasyoktāv akupyatvamārādhitacittatā /
V03vinsutru:130: Vin_1.106 / tadartham atadvan tam enaṃ kṛtopāsakatāntaṃ caturo māsān parivāsayed* saṃgho datvā parivāsaṃ karmaṇā /
V03vinsutru:134: Vin_1.110 / paripūrṇapañcadaśavarṣo sīti pravrajyartham upasaṃkrāntaṃ pṛcchet* /
V03vinsutru:135: Vin_1.111 / nonam asamarthaṃ kākoḍḍāyane samartham vā [2b5] saptavarṣaṃ pravrajayeyuḥ /
V03vinsutru:137: Vin_1.113 / aruciś ced anekadhyaṃ pravrajyāyāṃ pravrajyātiriktam upasam*pādayet* /
V03vinsutru:138: Vin_1.114 / ūnaś ced anyasmā upaniśrityartham arpayet* /
V03vinsutru:140: Vin_1.116 / upasaṃpādayed aprayacchato balād ādāya kṛdhāsaḥ /
V03vinsutru:141: Vin_1.117 / vyasiste kasyacit kicid deyam alpaṃ vā prabhūtam vā /
V03vinsutru:144: Vin_1.120 / nānārocitaṃ dūradeśam apy enaṃ saṃghe pravrājayet* /
V03vinsutru:146: Vin_1.122 / kṛtānujñāte so mātapitṛbhyām ante muktvā dūradeśakaṃ /
V03vinsutru:147: Vin_1.123 / māsi glānam ity upasaṃkrāntaṃ pṛcchet* /
V03vinsutru:148: Vin_1.124 / mā te glānyaṃ kañcid astīti vā /
V03vinsutru:158: Vin_1.132 / pāñcavidhyam asya jātyā pakṣāsaktaprādurbhāvīrṣayāpatkṛta iti /
V03vinsutru:161: jānato kṛtatāṃ vidher upasaṃpado prarūḍhatām vā dvitīyāyāṃ saṃghe na sā[3a2]rdhaṃ karmaṇaḥ pratyanubhūtatāyāṃ tatvaṃ /
V03vinsutru:163: Vin_1.135 / samāttedaṃ pravrajyasya taddṛṣṭer nikṣipyedaṃ cīvaran tena dhvajena tatrāruṇodgamane tattvaṃ /
V03vinsutru:171: Vin_1.143 / caturṇāṃ [3a3] pārajikānām anyat tam āpattim āpannaḥ /
V03vinsutru:172: Vin_1.144 / bhyupapataḥ syāc cet sāmagrī punaḥ praṇidhānaṃ /
V03vinsutru:176: / khañjaḥ kāṇḍarikaḥ kāṇaḥ kuṇiḥ kubjo tha vā manaḥ /
V03vinsutru:178: / strīchinnā bhārachinnā mārgachinnāś ca ye narāḥ /
V03vinsutru:179: / tālam uktā kandalichinnāḥ evaṃrūpa hi puruṣāḥ pratikṣiptā maharṣiṇā /
V03vinsutru:190: / avadātakeśāś ca ye narā nāgakeśā akeśakā /
V03vinsutru:203: / atigrīvā agrīvāś ca skandhākṣā api kubjakāḥ /
V03vinsutru:206: / caturbhiś ca chavivarṇaiḥ khelā vikaṭakās tathā /
V03vinsutru:212: Vin_1.155 / na dvyaṅgulād ūrdham āraṇyakaḥ keṣān dhārayet* /
V03vinsutru:218: Vin_1.161 / kārayeta vraṇanimittam arūṭṭāv anyathā vijñān* sthavirasthavirān avalokya /
V03vinsutru:220: Vin_1.163 / nānyatra kāye .. kṣurabhāram vā nakhachedaṃ bhajeta vāsimukhaṃ vā /
V03vinsutru:222: Vin_1.165 / bhajeta lekhaṃ malāpakṛṣṭyai na cīvareṇa keśaśmaśrv avatārayet* /
V03vinsutru:227: Vin_1.170 / avatārayeta prasādādau jīrṇo glāno vātātapavarṣeṣu ca /
V03vinsutru:231: Vin_1.174 / nānadhiṣṭhitā bhikṣuṇyaiṣā puruṣeṇāvītarāgā keśāṃ chedayet /
V03vinsutru:232: Vin_1.175 / saṃrajyamānām adhiṣṭhātrī samanuśiṣyān* [3b5] smṛtim upasthāpaya kim asmin* pūtikaḍevare sāram astīti /
V03vinsutru:233: Vin_1.176 / matṛsaṃjñāṃ bhaginyā duhitur veti kalpakaṃ /
V03vinsutru:235: Vin_1.178 / pañcāṅgikam vā śaucaṃ na nagnaḥ snāyāt* /
V03vinsutru:236: Vin_1.179 / na bhikṣuṇī puruṣatīrthe na strītīrthe cūrṇena /
V03vinsutru:240: Vin_1.183 / na bhikṣuṇī yoṣiti cūrṇaṃ kṣipet* /
V03vinsutru:247: Vin_1.189 / patrāṇy abhāve dattvo pūrataḥ pṛṣṭhataś ca pratigupte pradeśe snānaṃ /
V03vinsutru:258: Vin_1.197 / neṭṭanotgharṣeṇa kāyaṃ śodhayet* pādābhyām anyaṃ /
V03vinsutru:261: Vin_1.200 / na kiñcit kenacid āmuṣṭi celavarter bhikṣuṇy utgharṣet* /
V03vinsutru:264: Vin_1.203 / abhāve muhurtam u kuṭukena sthitvā snātraśāṭakena pocchanaṃ /
V03vinsutru:267: Vin_1.206 / bahiḥsaṃvṛttasyāntarviśālasya samudrākṛter vātā nasya mokṣo madhye /
V03vinsutru:280: Vin_1.219 / tṛṇo bhūmer āstaraṇamātrair autpattikenārdratvena temanena vā /
V03vinsutru:293: Vin_1.232 / madhyapātena pratyupatiṣṭhamānam ajñātam atraitgato nirjñānārthaṃ pṛcchet* /
V03vinsutru:301: Vin_1.240 / pīṭhaśuktayoś caukṣatāṃ kṛtva nikṣepo yathāsthāne /
V03vinsutru:302: Vin_1.241 / sarvatraiṣa bhāṇḍe vidhiḥ sarvam upakaraṃ suguptakelā[y]itaṃ kuryāt* /
V03vinsutru:326: Vin_1.265 / na yatra kvacana pādau prākṣālayet* /
V03vinsutru:332: Vin_1.271 / madhye saṃniveṣṭayā kadambapuṣpākārayā kharayā ca /
V03vinsutru:336: Vin_1.275 / pātranirmādanādi yatra pradeśe vihāre kuryāt tasyā mārjanam udakena pralepanam vā /
V03vinsutru:339: Vin_1.278 / na vidyate ratnārthatāyāṃ pralipter ākārasya niyamaḥ /
V03vinsutru:342: Vin_1.281 / trīṇi pātrāṇi jeṣṭham madhyaṃ kanīyaḥ /
V03vinsutru:343: Vin_1.282 / śeṣeṇordhabhāgāntānantarād aṅguṣṭhodarāt pakvatanḍulaprasthasyordhaṃ vā tad dvayāṃ māgadhakasyodvāhi sasūpasavyañjanasyaitan nyāyyaṃ /
V03vinsutru:344: Vin_1.283 / [4b6] na bhikṣuṇy ūrdha bhikṣukanīyaso dhārayeta /
V03vinsutru:354: Vin_1.293 / notthitaḥ pātraṃ karṣet prakṣipec choṣayed vā /
V03vinsutru:359: Vin_1.297 / na cocaṃ na hastamukh[o]dakaṃ dadyāt* /
V03vinsutru:370: Vin_1.307 / u[5a2]ttiṣṭhator vihāraparigaṇayor na khananena bhitteḥ /
V03vinsutru:375: Vin_1.312 / lambanam asya kāntārikayā vṛkṣe sādhu /
V03vinsutru:383: Vin_1.320 / na tulyāvalambānām āsv ālayanakānāṃ niveśam upayuṃjīta /
V03vinsutru:396: Vin_1.333 / tailena ghṛṣṭirāsitthasādṛśyāl lohena kuruvindena vā /
V03vinsutru:398: Vin_1.335 / avaguṇṭhya bhūrjena mṛdānulipya pākasya madhyasya /
V03vinsutru:399: Vin_1.336 / ghṛṣṭis tailena guḍamṛdamṛnma[5a5]yasya bhujyamā tve pākyatvaṃ māsaṣaṭkānte /
V03vinsutru:401: Vin_1.338 / varṣāś cetad virūkṣaṇe mrakṣitatvena kāryāntarāle sya saṃyojyatvaṃ /
V03vinsutru:407: Vin_1.344 / bhasmanaḥ pūrayitvā sādhu bhedanaṃ ghaṭabhedanakena /
V03vinsutru:411: Vin_1.348 / piṇyākena gomayena vā liptābhyantareṇa upagataśoṣeṇa /
V03vinsutru:417: Vin_1.354 / sāmantakasya prāṇa[5b1]kānām anukampayā sammārjanaṃ sekaś ca /
V03vinsutru:418: Vin_1.355 / prarohasya parivyañjanam ajñāto varṣāgrasyopasaṃpadyaṅgīkaraṇaṃ vyājenāsya pratyavekṣaṇaṃ /
V03vinsutru:422: Vin_1.359 / darśanopavicāra enam avakāśane sthāpayeyuḥ gaṇābhimukhaṃ vragṛhītāñjaliṃ* /
V03vinsutru:426: Vin_1.363 / daharam apy abhāve vṛddhataram āpṛcchet* /
V03vinsutru:428: Vin_1.365 / nānavalokya tajjātīyaṃ parikarmayet tena vātmānaṃ /
V03vinsutru:429: Vin_1.366 / nirdoṣam abhāve pravṛttaparyeṣanasya niḥśrayārhasyāniḥśritasya vāse /
V03vinsutru:432: Vin_1.369 / [5b3] viśramyākantuko dvitīye tritīye vāhni niḥśrayaṃ gṛhṇīt* /
V03vinsutru:437: Vin_1.374 / nirjñāya vṛttajñānaparivārānugrāhakatvaṃ prasnādināsya grahaṇaṃ saṃvaravat* /
V03vinsutru:441: Vin_1.378 / tatt[ai]vopādhyāy[e] niḥśritatvaṃ tasmād agrahaṇam asya tatra /
V03vinsutru:446: Vin_1.383 / trir divasena niḥśritam upasaṃkrāmet tadvihārasthaḥ /
V03vinsutru:452: Vin_1.389 / anālāpo navavāda upasthānadharmāmiṣair asaṃbhogaḥ prārabdhakuśalapakṣasamucchedo niḥśrayapratipraśrambhaṇañ ca /
V03vinsutru:454: Vin_1.391 / kusītasya durvacaso nādṛtasya pāpamitrasya ca /
V03vinsutru:456: Vin_1.393 / anādṛtau bhikṣoḥ praguṇīkaraṇā[5b6]ya prayogo bhijñasya /
V03vinsutru:462: Vin_1.399 / pariśrāvaṇakuṇḍike datvā sāntarottarañ ca śrāmaṇerasya /
V03vinsutru:474: Vin_1.409 / pramaṇam asya dvādaśakād aṅgulīnāṃ prabhṛtyāṣṭakāta) /
V03vinsutru:484: Vin_1.419 / na tīkṣṇena dantaṃ jihvāṃ karṇañ cotghṛṣet* /
V03vinsutru:487: Vin_1.422 / nāprakṣālya digdhaṃ mukhamalena pradeśam a[6a3]vaguṇṭhya vā pāṃśunā dantajihvayoḥ yavanaṃ chorayet* /
V03vinsutru:490: Vin_1.425 / uccārapraśrāvakheṭasiṃ*ghāṇakavāntam viriktam a[p]y anyac ca /
V03vinsutru:491: Vin_1.426 / nirmādanasyāto pi saṃpattir ūṣāḍukagomayād api /
V03vinsutru:494: Vin_1.429 / ato nantaraṃ kālyam upasaṃkramya vandanaṃ /
V03vinsutru:503: Vin_1.438 / sāhyaṃ ced abhirucitaṃ tenaiva saha praveśaḥ /
V03vinsutru:519: Vin_1.454 / asammatam utthānakārakatvena grihītasammārjanīkaṃ dṛṣṭvālpotsukaṃ kuryāt* /
V03vinsutru:526: Vin_1.461 / śanaiḥ saṃ[6b1]prajānan* praviś[e]n niṣkrāmec cāsaṃgharṣayaṃ dvāraśākhe /
V03vinsutru:544: Vin_1.478 / tadupasaṃhāraḥ vyutthāpanāyām āpatter ānulomikājīvitapariskārasaṃpattau codyogaḥ /
V03vinsutru:548: Vin_1.482 / [6b3] sā hy aśaktau niḥśritaṃ yena pravṛttiḥ /
V03vinsutru:557: Vin_1.491 / yānakachatrāro[6b4]paṇādikārān enam udiśya kuryuḥ sāṃghikāt* /
V03vinsutru:559: Vin_1.493 / deyatvam ā[bhy]ām āttasya tenāmṛtyau sati vibhave /
V03vinsutru:561: Vin_1.495 / nārthyām asya dharmāñ cājñāṃ vilomayet* /
V03vinsutru:565: Vin_1.499 / sāṃghikād enam asau māraṇāśaṃkāyāṃ śayanāsanād utthāpya [6b5] pautgalike niveśayeta /
V03vinsutru:575: Vin_1.509 / drutaś cet* syād āgamaya yāvat sthavirāgaccha[6b6]tītenaṃ brūyuḥ /
V03vinsutru:576: Vin_1.510 / pāṇyudakadāne ca gatatve bhyavahārāyāsti cet* kālaḥ -
V03vinsutru:580: Vin_1.513 / duḥprāvritatve durnivastatāyāṃ vā sauṣṭhavārtham anayor nimittam asmai kurvīt* /
V03vinsutru:582: Vin_1.515 / asaṃpattau svayaṃ nainān* saṃlāpayen navakān* /
V03vinsutru:583: Vin_1.516 / yatreṣām vihārāraṇyayor vṛttis tat vṛttaṃ grāhayen niyuñjī /
V03vinsutru:586: Vin_1.518 / gamiko diksārthāvāsaśayanāsanaṃ sahāyakāBś ca glānyena pahāyitvena tolayitvā prakrāmet* /
V03vinsutru:587: Vin_1.519 / sarva paścāt mā kasyacit kiñcit pramuṣitam ity apetya dūram utsārayet* /
V03vinsutru:591: Vin_1.523 / varṣopagato nusaṃjñā ya vihāram apratisaṃskurvataḥ saṃskārayet* /
V03vinsutru:596: Vin_1.528 / akaraṇe niṣṭau vā dharmyām ebhyaḥ kathaṃ kṛtvedam asmākaṃ saṃvidyata iti brūyāt* /
V03vinsutru:608: Vin_1.540 / anuddhataḥ kule syād anunnaḍā[7a4]n avasthitaḥ /
V03vinsutru:616: Vin_1.548 / gṛhī cet* dharmyām asmai kathaṃ kuryāt* /
V03vinsutru:617: Vin_1.549 / [7a5] anāgacchaty atra grāmāntikas saṃrañjanīyaṃ yathāśakti pravartayet* /
V03vinsutru:620: Vin_1.552 / upagacched vilomāṃ parijanakriyāṃ na cet svaparopaghātāya /
V03vinsutru:621: Vin_1.553 / asmai cec chaktau samucchidyaināṃ dharmyām utpādya tayā saṃjñapayeta /
V03vinsutru:622: Vin_1.554 / bhaṅge praroge vā tannidānaṃ parijanasya pratisaṃska[7a6]raṇaṃ /
V03vinsutru:625: Vin_1.557 / saṃghārāme parādhyāṃs tathā kuryād yathā svayaṃ grāhikayā grahaṇaṃ gaccheta /
V03vinsutru:626: Vin_1.558 / agacchantam anārocya sahasā kasyacit kumāramitrāmatyabhaṭṭarājaputrapādamūlikān* grāhayitvā śuddhikāyāṃ parṣadi nihanyāt* /
V03vinsutru:628: Vin_1.560 / upasaṃpady anyasya tadyācanādau karmakartuḥ [7b1] atrācayas saṃghaḥ /
V03vinsutru:630: Vin_1.562 / śikṣamāṇātvaṃ nāma striyām aparaṃ parva /
V03vinsutru:632: Vin_1.564 / śrāmaṇerikātvabhikṣuṇītvayor antarāle varṣadvayañ caraṇasya kālaḥ /
V03vinsutru:676: Vin_1.606 / na puruṣānukṛtitvaṃ striyā stryanukṛtitvaṃ ca puruṣasya vyañjanāntaraprakāraḥ /
V03vinsutru:689: Vin_1.619 / arhatvaṃ pravrajy[o]pasaṃpador upagatau puṃstvasya hīnāyāṃ yoṣiti /
V03vinsutru:708: Vin_2.8 / śikṣā pratyācakṣe buddhaṃ dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ sūtraṃ vinayaṃ mātṛkām ācāryam upādhyāyam āgārikamāndhārayaśramaṇoddeśaṃ ṣaṇḍkapaṇḍakaṃ bhikṣuṇīdūṣakaṃ /
V03vinsutru:709_0: steyasaṃvāsikaṃ nānāsaṃvāsikam asaṃvāsikaṃ tīrthikaṃ tīrthikāvakrāntagaṃ mātṛghātakaṃ
V03vinsutru:709_2: alaṃ me yusmadvidhaiḥ brahmacāritiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃvāsena vāsabhogena ceti pratyākhyānavacanāni /
V03vinsutru:722: Vin_2.19 / nāgupto divā pārśvaṃ dattvā middham avakramet* /
V03vinsutru:724: Vin_2.21 / baddhadvāraparivṛtasthatvam ārakṣitatvaṃ bhikṣūṇā grathitatvam adhonivasanasya /

V03vinsutru:2413: Vin_2.1446 / kṣīraṃ dadhi navanītaṃ matsyaṃ māṃsam* vallūrā [25a5] iti praṇītabhojanaṃ /
V03vinsutru:2414: Vin_2.1447 / etat kartṛtvaṃ ajñātigṛhītā ca dātuḥ /
V03vinsutru:2415: Vin_2.1448 / svavijñaptyābhyavahṛtau vijñaptau kāritatve cāsyā duṣkṛtasya /
V03vinsutru:2417: Vin_2.1450 / tasmāl labhamānasyāpi ced anyallūhaṃ praṇītam vā samaṃ prakṛṣṭaṃ vā vijñaptiḥ /
V03vinsutru:2420: tiṣṭhataḥ pratikṣipto vā tat kiṃ* yācasa iti / prasnasya
V03vinsutru:2430: Vin_2.1459 / tadyathā [25b2] snānaṃ* pānaṃ* dantakāṣṭhavisarjanaṃ* hastapādaprakṣālanaṃ* /
V03vinsutru:2431: Vin_2.1460 / upakārye sa upayogo ya upakaraṇeṣu /
V03vinsutru:2434: Vin_2.1463 / teṣu upayogas tadyathā nirmādanaṃ bhāvanaṃ* rañjanaṃ* sekaḥ sam*mārga upalepaḥ /
V03vinsutru:2439: Vin_2.1468 / tenāsya hi riktaprāṇakadhātāv udaka ity api prayogāḥ
V03vinsutru:2444: Vin_2.1470 / dattapratyeṣṭyabhāṇḍottmākāśāvasthāpyākīryamāṇapavyajalapra-[25b4]tyeṣṭyapavitya asam* yamārthaya lahakaṇṭakaras tridaṇḍas tadākhyaḥ /
V03vinsutru:2461: Vin_2.1487 / ātyuhāyāṃ kalpikajalasya sam*[26a1]bhāvadāyāñ ca karakakuṇḍikābhyām etat tadvattvaṃ /
V03vinsutru:2464: Vin_2.1489 / tadrūpaś cet pratyayaḥ kṣamayitvā kāryakaraṇe stitvam āstitvaṃ /
V03vinsutru:2465: Vin_2.1490 / tasmāt tadvattvam atra dāne pratijñāte nyena /
V03vinsutru:2466: Vin_2.1491 / naitaj janapadacārikāyām viyuktau dānāpratijñāne saṃśrayet* /
V03vinsutru:2469: Vin_2.1494 / na pramīlya gatasya sthāne tadvattvābhāve kāmajaḥ /
V03vinsutru:2472: Vin_2.1497 / krośamanu gacchato 'syāmanusroto 'nusaṃhitaṃ* pratyavekṣaṇāt tena pravṛttiḥ /
V03vinsutru:2473: Vin_2.1498 / sambhedaś ced atrodakāntareṇa prāk tataḥ /
V03vinsutru:2480: Vin_2.1505 / tūlikayā sukaraṃ prāṇakānāṃ darśayanaṃ* ślakṣṇayā /
V03vinsutru:2485: Vin_2.1510 / pañjaraṃ vaṃśavi[26a4]dalikānāṃ śuklavastrasya veṣṭim abhrapaṭalena vā tadākhyam /
V03vinsutru:2487: Vin_2.1512 / ādyakṛtitvā karparaṃ vā ghaṭādeś chidritam /
V03vinsutru:2489: Vin_2.1514 / achaṭāśabdaṃ kṛtvā bhadramukhādarśanapathe tiṣṭheti vadet* /
V03vinsutru:2490: Vin_2.1515 / asthitāvajapadakena daṇḍena śanaiṣkumbhe kuṇḍake vā prakṣipya chidrāṇi kṛtvā mukhaṃ pidhāya niṣkāsanam /
V03vinsutru:2491: Vin_2.1516 / [26a5] asaṃmattau paṭṭikayā loṭhikayā murucikayā vā rajupāśena vā natuke veṣṭitena grīvāyāṃ baddhvā /
V03vinsutru:2514: Vin_2.1538 / nānena dānapatīnāṃ vihāre deyatvasya noktatā [26b3] navasya bhikṣave niddeyatvena /
V03vinsutru:2531: Vin_2.1555 / gambhīrāṇām uśīrakurvakena patravaibhaṅgukair natrakena vā yaṣṭyām upanibaddhena /
V03vinsutru:2560: Vin_2.1577 / utsṛjya jñātiṃ* pravrajāpekṣaṃ* glānañ ca /
V03vinsutru:2578: Vin_2.1591 / vinaite tatra rātrindivadvayaparipūrer ūrdham vāse /
V03vinsutru:2590: Vin_2.1601 / spṛṣṭir udyūthanaṃ prasthāya darśanārtham upavicārāntātikrame dṛṣṭir iti mūlāni /
V03vinsutru:2592: Vin_2.1603 / na hastyaśvakukkuṭalāvakavartakastrīpuruṣayuddhādi kuryāt kārayen nirīkṣeta vā /
V03vinsutru:2596: Vin_2.1605 / kāyatanniḥsṛṣṭasambaddhair yena [27b1]kenacid antataḥ pādāṅguṣṭhasarṣapatūlikabhiḥ prahṛtau /
V03vinsutru:2605: Vin_2.1614 / na bhittau bhūmyāṃ vṛkṣe nyatra vā /
V03vinsutru:2619: Vin_2.1622 // saṃ*cintya muktvā rogapratikṛyārtha tāṃ gṛhī dātṛbhaktachedasya kāraṇe /
V03vinsutru:2623: Vin_2.1624 / śāstṛdharmasaṃghasabrahmacāriṇāṃ dharmyakaraṇīyārthatāpekṣā pātraraṃgakarmaṇoś ca samayādhiṣṭhānam* /
V03vinsutru:2650: Vin_2.1645 / na sopacārāt parasya layanamātrāt pṛthagbhūtādhyāsitasya /
V03vinsutru:2655: Vin_2.1648 / adhvano tra kukkuṭasyotpātya nilayane ntaram abhūtatvaṃ /
V03vinsutru:2664: Vin_2.1655 / [28a3]anupasaṃpannena sārdham agāre tritīyasyāṃ rātro svapne /
V03vinsutru:2666: Vin_2.1657 / prāk duṣgṛtaṃ nirdoṣam adhvapariśrāntasya klāntau /
V03vinsutru:2668: Vin_2.1659 / akalpini ca bhikṣor karaṇīye tatsaṃpādakena sārdhaṃ* glānasya tadupasthāyinaś ca /
V03vinsutru:2669: Vin_2.1660 / śrāmaṇereṇa ca tadvataḥ sannihitatāyāṃ tatrāvāse pāpabhikṣoḥ kṛtakurvattan nivāsaprayatnasya /
V03vinsutru:2670: Vin_2.1661 / upagato [28a4]paścimakālayor dvayor ādyayor māsayor vartamānasya /
V03vinsutru:2675: Vin_2.1666 / middhopapātenādhvani śrāmaṇeram abhiplutaṃ* purataḥ kṛtvā gacchet* /
V03vinsutru:2676: Vin_2.1667 / bubhukṣitaś cet sānukālaṃ dadyād asmai tadāhāram* /
V03vinsutru:2680_0: Vin_2.1669 // tathāham bhagavato dharmadeśitam ājānāmi yathā āntareyikadharmā uktā
V03vinsutru:2680_1: bhagavato pratiṣevyamāne lam antarāyāyetyādi pravṛttavacanatāvasarge jaigupsyamata
V03vinsutru:2699_0: Vin_2.1684 / jñapte caturthasya te karmaṇa iti pūrvatrottaratranāśanīyasya te ity
V03vinsutru:2699_1: upakramaṃ jñapti<<ḥ>> kṛtā ni<<ḥ>>sṛjedam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakaṃ dṛṣṭigataṃ prathamā karmavācanā
V03vinsutru:2699_2: kṛtā dvitīyeti pratyetadantam asmai bhikṣuṇā śrāvayeyuḥ /
V03vinsutru:2713: Vin_2.1696 / ekatve vṛddhāntād ārabhya yāvat saṃbhāvanām uparidānaṃ /
V03vinsutru:2715: Vin_2.1698 / anvākrāmed upanimantritaḥ puṇyakāmena navamāchinnadaśāt parāhatyānityatāmanasikāreṇa /
V03vinsutru:2720: Vin_2.1701 / śastram etat saṃgrāmāvacaraṃ bhāṇḍañ ca gandharvāvacaraṃ /
V03vinsutru:2723: Vin_2.1704 / muktvā svīkārānā anugata dravyāvināśacittasya vihāratadupacāragataṃ /
V03vinsutru:2728: Vin_2.1707 / nāsamuditacinnāya svāmy aham iti bruvate dadyāt* /
V03vinsutru:2731: Vin_2.1710 / ūrdham anāgatau yat bhūmau buddhasāṃghikayor labdhiṃ* tatropayuktiḥ /
V03vinsutru:2732: Vin_2.1711 / ayogyatve krayanaṃ yogyasya tena sthāvarasya /
V03vinsutru:2733: Vin_2.1712 / tadā cet svāmy āgacched anujñānam āyā..ya[29a2]n ichate dadyuḥ /
V03vinsutru:2734: Vin_2.1713 / vṛddhiñ cet mṛgayed etad eva na bahu manyase yad asmābhiḥ paripālitam iti brūyuḥ /
V03vinsutru:2746: Vin_2.1725 / gopayitvotrāse gṛhītvā vānuparodhe svasya sāṃghikam* [29a4]staupikañ ca hiraṇyasuvarṇam apakramaṇaṃ /
V03vinsutru:2752: Vin_2.1731 / nirdoṣam amānuṣabhavane puṇyanirjātaṃ ced eṣāṃ ratnamayaṃ bhūmisopādānādi /
V03vinsutru:2753: Vin_2.1732 / bhojane ca bhājanam asambhave nyasya /
V03vinsutru:2759: Vin_2.1738 / niṣīded dharmaśravaṇārthaṃ ratnamaye siṃ*hāsane parāhatyānityatāmanasikāreṇa /
V03vinsutru:2764: Vin_2.1742 [29b1]nākalpikatvam upasthāpitaśāstṛsaṃjñānām āgārikaśrāmaṇerābhāve buddhapra kṛter dharmyārthavaśatayā spṛṣṭau /
V03vinsutru:2770: Vin_2.1748 / cihnaṃ sāṃghikāyām madhye cakraṃ pārśvayor mṛgāv adhastād vihārasvā[29b2]mino nāma(ḥ) /
V03vinsutru:2790: Vin_2.1768 / anabhimato dātuḥ śironte pādānte vā /
V03vinsutru:2793: Vin_2.1771 / lambanaṃ mālādyāśūcyām atrāvatūsitāyāṃ kaṇṭake vā /
V03vinsutru:2801: Vin_2.1778 / na cet* stambhasya[29b5]śuṣire kuḍyasya vā nikṣepaḥ /
V03vinsutru:2807: Vin_2.1784 / guryāt śāstṛguṇasaṃkīrtane tridaṇḍakadāne ca svaraguptiṃ* /
V03vinsutru:2826: Vin_2.1801 / śiṣṭād adhyardhato grīsmasya pūrvataś ca varṣāṇāṃ māsāt* /
V03vinsutru:2840: Vin_2.1813 / tasmād utta[30a4]raṇaṃ saṃcetitayā mūrchitasekeṣv anāpattiḥ /
V03vinsutru:2842: Vin_2.1815 / na saṃbhave parasyotsvāsakalpaṃ saṃśrayet snātaprāyaś cittikaṃ //
V03vinsutru:2845: Vin_2.1817 tadānyadā vā tannidānaṃ mṛtau duṣkṛta(kṛ)
V03vinsutru:2849: Vin_2.1818 // na tvam upasaṃpannaḥ parājayikam asyāpanna ityādyartha bhikṣvarthena kaukṛtyopasaṃhṛtau [30a5]bhikṣoḥ /
V03vinsutru:2867: Vin_2.1832 / kṣolasūpayū[30b2]ṣamaṇḍe ca satyam api taptatāyāṃ /
V03vinsutru:2876: Vin_2.1839 // mātṛgrāmeṇa sārdham ekasmin āgāre middhāvakrāntau [30b3]niśayāṃ /
V03vinsutru:2883: Vin_2.1844 / bhayaṃkarasyāmuko yam iti bhikṣoḥ pareṇāpy anutpattāv api bhayasya /
V03vinsutru:2885: Vin_2.1846 / tad yathā pretapiśācakumbhāṇḍakaṭapūtanatvā[30b4]khyāpinām* kīṭanaṃ kīṭakīṭānām aṅgārikā nāṃ dagdhasthūṇānibhānāṃ rūpāṇāṃ /
V03vinsutru:2905: Vin_2.1861 // dattasya bhikṣor nirdeyaṃ cīvarasya vinā tadanujñānaṃ paribhoge /
V03vinsutru:2906: Vin_2.1862 / na ced asya tannidānaṃ prītes sambhāvanā /
V03vinsutru:2909: Vin_2.1863 // dhvansanachandena bikṣor vinidhāyasaṃjñā saṃghāvaśeṣāpatanasya vijñaptau /
V03vinsutru:2917: Vin_2.1869 / naṣṭañ cenam adhvano dhvany avatārayantīṃ* /
V03vinsutru:2921: Vin_2.1871 // grāmaghātakaiś coraiḥ śulkabhañjakair vā vaṇigbhiḥ /
V03vinsutru:2927: Vin_2.1875 / nāsāv enaṃ pūrṇatāṃ na pṛcchet* /
V03vinsutru:2949: Vin_2.1894 / tasmāt kārtsnyam eva sa nyūnānyatra vṛtāyāṃ /
V03vinsutru:2962: Vin_2.1905 / udyoja[31b2]nañ ca pariveṣaṇe tipattau kālasya /
V03vinsutru:2967: Vin_2.1910 / vinā maryādāvyavasthāpanena pravāritavato nyathā paunaḥpuṇyenātyarthatayā cordham akṛtapravāraṇāca caturthamāsaparisamāpter ūrdhaṃ prajñaptābhyavahṛtau /
V03vinsutru:2973: Vin_2.1916 / purastād api yena na pravāritaḥ /
V03vinsutru:2979: Vin_2.1920 / asyānte śikṣitasya mityākhyā dayamānāyām uddeśena vā bhikṣuṇā na śi[31b4]kṣiṣyāmīty etat kāraṇabhāvena nivedayiturajñatām utbhāvayato vacanasyodāhṛtau /
V03vinsutru:2983: Vin_2.1922 / bhikṣor adhikaraṇasaṃpradhāraṇasya bhikṣubhir upaśrutyartham utsṛjyopaśamanachandenāvadhāne /
V03vinsutru:2987: Vin_2.1926 / arthāntara[31b5]vaśāyām upaśliṣṭau cetanād ūrdham padacchaṭotkāśanaśabdādibhiḥr acetayato na cet mugdhaḥ śamārthī vā niyatamātṛtāyāṃ pātaḥ /
V03vinsutru:2989: Vin_2.1928 / nopaśṛṇuyāta nainaṃ kurvantam anuparivātya tiṣṭhet* /
V03vinsutru:3027: Vin_2.1956 / abhāve tra bhikṣos tadvat bhikṣuṇī /
V03vinsutru:3037: Vin_2.1964 / tanmukhikayā ca saṃghopanimantraṇenāsmad ānāgamanavaśāt pariveṣo 'tipātya ity apariprāpya dātari tṛtīyaprabhṛtau /
V03vinsutru:3055: Vin_2.1978 / [32b2]vartamāne prātimokṣoddeśe nubhūtavatadvayasyāsaṃvignena manasā saṃprati mayā jñātam ayam apy atra dharmo vidyata ity asyoktau /
V03vinsutru:3073: Vin_2.1992 / anyaś ca muktvā śiraḥ pādāntau /
V03vinsutru:3090: Vin_2.2006 / pañca tūlāni śālmalamārkaṃ kāśamayaṃ vaukamaira[33a1]kañ ca /
V03vinsutru:3093: Vin_2.2007 / niṣadanasya pramāṇam asya dairghyasya hastatrayaṃ/
V03vinsutru:3109: Vin_2.2017 / tatpramāṇasyātat tanordhvam vā cīvarasya karaṇakāraṇe /
V03vinsutru:3117: Vin_2.2021 / svapratipādi[33a3]tasyāpariveṣeṇa svayaṃ grāmasthena pratigṛhya khādanīyabhojanīyasyābhyavahāre /
V03vinsutru:3121: Vin_2.2025 / nāsannidhau nikṣeptur ādānaṃ nikṣiptasya tasmā(mmā)t* /
V03vinsutru:3123: Vin_2.2026 / khādyakam iha dehi pānakaṃ bho[33a4]janaṃ bhūyo cetyādi tasmin* bhikṣvantare vā vyapadeśapravṛttabhikṣuṇyavasthānakartṛ /
V03vinsutru:3124: Vin_2.2027 / na cet tanmukhikayā tatjñātinā vā nimantraṇakam /
V03vinsutru:3126: Vin_2.2029 / āgamayasva tāvad bhagini yāvad bhikṣavo bhuñjata ity anājñaptāyāṃ tasyāṃ bhikṣuṇā yena kena cid asahabhujā pitṛprabhṛtibhikṣunimantraṇaka[33a5]bhuktau /
V03vinsutru:3134: Vin_2.2036 / śrāddhasya vighātaś cedd asya dāne kula[33b1]śikṣāsamvṛtiṃ dadyuḥ /
V03vinsutru:3136: Vin_2.2038 / dattaitadaś cittaṃ buddhvā niveśanagamanāsanaparibhogadharmadeśanāni kuryāt* /
V03vinsutru:3138: Vin_2.2040 / dadyād asya yācamānebhyo bālebhyaḥ piṇḍapātrāt pūpikām asakalāṃ /
V03vinsutru:3140: Vin_2.2042 / dattāśikṣāsamvṛteḥ kulāt prāktaddānād animantritaś ca pratigṛhya khādanī[33b2]yabhojanīyayor utsṛjyakakaṭikāmūlakaharitakam avighāty abhyavahṛtau /
V03vinsutru:3150: Vin_2.2051 / araṇye bahirārāmasya pratigṛhya khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyam cābhyavaharet* /
V03vinsutru:3156: Vin_2.2054 / [33b4] tathā nivasanaṃ nivasīta yathā parimaṇḍalaṃ saṃsthitaṃ syāt* /
V03vinsutru:3162: Vin_2.2060 / tathā cīvaraṃ prāvṛṇvīta yathā syādyaṃ trayaṃ syāt* /
V03vinsutru:3193: Vin_2.2090 / nānāgate khādanīye bhojanīye pā[34a2]tram upanāmayet* /
V03vinsutru:3199: Vin_2.2096 / na bhūyaskāmatayaudanena sūpikaṃ sūpikena caudanaṃ pratichādayeta /
V03vinsutru:3203: Vin_2.2100 / na sālopena mukhena vācaṃ [34a3] niścārayet* /
V03vinsutru:3215: Vin_2.2112 / naitad antargṛhe chorayed anavalokya gṛhapatiṃ /
V03vinsutru:3217: Vin_2.2114 / triḥ prakṣālya pātramārṣabhir gāthābhir abhimantrapātrodakaṃ dadyāt* /
V03vinsutru:3221: Vin_2.2118 / na prapātena prāgbhāreṇa na catuspathe /
V03vinsutru:3227: Vin_2.2124 / na nīcatarāsane niṣaṇṇa uccatarake niṣaṇṇāya /
V03vinsutru:3229: Vin_2.2126 / na pṛṣṭato gacchan* purato gacchane /
V03vinsutru:3241: Vin_2.2138 / na puruṣadaghnād ūrdhaṃ vṛkṣasyādhirohed anyatrāpadaḥ /
V03vinsutru:3254: Vin_2.2148 / paṃsaś cet tadānīm* tatra vijñāyamānan tayaitat(a) /
V03vinsutru:3258: Vin_2.2152 / na bālam apy anyanna spṛśet* /
V03vinsutru:3264: Vin_2.2157 / pratyupasthitaṃ sevāyāṃ raktan tasyāṃ pumāṃsaṃ tatprāpyatāyāṃ /
V03vinsutru:3265: Vin_2.2158 / auddhatyasya raktena sārddhaṃ raktayā karaṇe sthūlaṃ /
V03vinsutru:3285: Vin_2.2173 / nātaḥ paṇyena dāsyāḥ preṣaṇasya bahir bhāvaḥ /
V03vinsutru:3295: Vin_2.2182 / na raktād araktāyāḥ [35a1] kiñcitkasvīkāre doṣa iti bhikṣuṇībodhane /
V03vinsutru:3306: Vin_2.2191 / cīvared ekākinī jñātigṛhabhuktinimittaṃ durbhikṣe labdhāyāṃ jñātibhir
V03vinsutru:3329: Vin_2.2208 / ratnapratyākhyānam idaṃ tulyatvam anyaśramaṇānāṃ tatra brahmacaryacariṣyatva(ṃ)
V03vinsutru:3356: Vin_2.2222 / pratyarddhamāsam ārye hany anadhiṣṭhito vādhiṣṭhānikasya /
V03vinsutru:3371: Vin_2.2231 / bhikṣuṇī mahājanārthaṃ samādāpya svatra pariṇamanam* /
V03vinsutru:3415: Vin_2.2260 / sa cen me cīvaraṃ dadāsi tataḥ svopasaṃpādayāmīty upasaṃpatprekṣayā vacane /
V03vinsutru:3475: Vin_2.2309 / anāpattir anayā sārddham anekayāpi kṛtāvaraṇatāyāṃ vṛśyādinopasthitasmṛtir anāsvādane 'ṅgasaṃsparśasyācalamañ ce prākṛte saṃstare vā /
V03vinsutru:3503: Vin_2.2330 / paribhujya dharmaśravaṇadānāvasthāyāgā[36b4]rikaśayanāsanam utsṛjyān avalokya gṛhiṇe prakramaṇe /
V03vinsutru:3507: Vin_2.2333 / anāpatti[ḥ] loṭhakāṣṭhañ ca kasyārthe pratigupte pradeśe /
V03vinsutru:3514: Vin_2.2340 / anāpattiḥ bhikṣusaṃghasya ācāryasabrahmacāriṇām arthe pratigupte pradeśe /
V03vinsutru:3522: Vin_2.2345 / k[ā]lānukālam asya śocanaṃ rañjanañ ca /
V03vinsutru:3551: Vin_2.2366 / na bhikṣoḥ purastād gocare caret /
V03vinsutru:3554: Vin_2.2369 / niṣāda enāṃ sthitātināmane niṣaṇṇo nimuñcīta /
V03vinsutru:3583: Vin_2.2390 / devakulādau tīrthyāśraye gatvā vādasya karaṇe /

V03vinsutru:3589: Vin_2.2395 / anāpattiḥ glānye sphuṭatve ca nīlatṛṇaiḥ sarvasya /

V03vinsutru:3655: Vin_2.2433 / saṃbhāvini kāryasya kāle 'vaśiṣṭe yathāsukhaṃ karaṇaṃ dattatridaṇḍake /
V03vinsutru:3670_1: tatjñaiḥ bhikṣubhiḥ parikīrttite sannidhau saṃghasya sthāvare cihne karmaṇaḥ [38a6] karaṇam /
V03vinsutru:3676: Vin_2.2452 / yujyate dvayoḥ sīmnor ekena vacasā bandho mokṣo vā /

V03vinsutru:3715: Vin_2.2489 / pareṇa pañcadaśyāṃ gṛhītatve bhikṣor muñcainaṃ bhikṣuṃ sabrahmacāryeṣasmākam iti brūyuḥ /
V03vinsutru:3716: Vin_2.2490 / amuktāvasty asmākam anena sārddhaṃ kiñcid eva karaṇīya[38b5]m iti sādyaṃ /
V03vinsutru:3718: Vin_2.2492 / norddham asya mokṣāya na vyāyaccheyuḥ /

V03vinsutru:3721: Vin_2.2495 / na vicikitsitaṃ niścitaṃ vā kalpamānatve 'nutthiter doṣasya kartṛ /
V03vinsutru:3722: Vin_2.2496 / kartṛśuddheḥ paryṣitaṃ bhāvato na kalpataḥ /
V03vinsutru:3726: Vin_2.2498 / poṣadhaṃ kurvīran pañcadaśyām anvarddhamāsaṃ prātimokṣasūtroddeśena /
V03vinsutru:3729: Vin_2.2501 / bhāṣaṇenaiva nidānoddeśasyoccāraṇena saṃpādanīyatvaṃ jñapteś ca /
V03vinsutru:3772: Vin_2.2543 / yogyatvaṃ sarvāṅgeṣu grahaṇagamane sevāyāṃ pratibalatvaṃ /
V03vinsutru:3783: Vin_2.2554 / ardhatvam vāhyake pravrājite gṛhītvasyārūḍhidhvastayoś ca /
V03vinsutru:3806: Vin_2.2575 / vātāyanañ ca vi tṛtīye ūrdham bahissamvṛtam antarviśālaṃ sādhu /
V03vinsutru:3812: Vin_2.2581 / bahirvā ca prahāṇamaṇḍapasya layanapaṅkter vā /
V03vinsutru:3820: Vin_2.2589 / mauñjaṃ sāṇaṃ vālvajaṃ paṭṭikā vetravaibhaṅgukam iti /
V03vinsutru:3824: Vin_2.2593 / ūrṇā śaṇaḥ karpyāso natukāni patravaibhaṅgukañ ca /
V03vinsutru:3825: Vin_2.2594 / kākapadakānā[39b5]m antaro ntare yathārtham avasthāpanāya dānam /
V03vinsutru:3829: Vin_2.2598 / sanaiḥ aduḥkhanārthamāḍhakaṃ chitter veṣṭitāyāś ca natukaiḥ /
V03vinsutru:3840: Vin_2.2609 / svaṃ cedekamatadvantaṃ pañcadaśāṃ manyeta [prema]sapremakaprāguṇye prayatet* /

V03vinsutru:3841_1: cedaṃ ca kṛtaṃ kṛtam evaṃ [40a2] saty āyusmān* sāpattiko nāham āyusmann eko pi tu
V03vinsutru:3841_2: sarvasaṃgho nenārthenāṅgatāvattvam āyusmān svām āpattiṃ* yathādharmaṃ pratikuru kin
V03vinsutru:3841_3: te kariṣyati sarvasaṃgha iti prakrameṇa darśanapathe śiṣṭānām icchāyāṃ deśayet* /

V03vinsutru:3845: Vin_2.2614 / catuṣkato rvāgbhāve vihārakaraṇīyaṃ sthitam eva /

V03vinsutru:3848: Vin_2.2617 / darśana bhikṣuṇām aṅga tāvad āyusmanta[40a4]s tvaritatvaritam āgacchatām āryasaṃghasya poṣadhaḥ pravaraṇā vā pāñcadaśika iti vacanaṃ /
V03vinsutru:3855: Vin_2.2624 / nāsatprātimokṣasūtroddeśake tadāsthāne jñātvā poṣadham āgamayet* /
V03vinsutru:3865: Vin_2.2633 / trikam ardhayojanaṃ krośam ardhakro[40a6]śaṃ pariṣaṇḍām vā /
V03vinsutru:3871: Vin_2.2639 / śāstṛdharatvam eṣāṃ bhikṣum īrṣyantaṃ bodhayeyuḥ /
V03vinsutru:3872: Vin_2.2640 / nākṛtapoṣadhaḥ pravāraṇas taddine prajñāyamānasv ata(da)
V03vinsutru:3873: ḥ sthānāt prakrāmen na cet tadaiva tadvadhe prāptiḥ kalikṛtbhyo vimuktir anuprāptiḥ [40b1] sat*vṛttānā tat parāyanatvam vā /
V03vinsutru:3875: Vin_2.2642 / nābhikṣukaṃ sabhikṣukād asahitaḥ śiṣṭair anyatrāpadaḥ kāyacittaprasrabdhivaśatā ta vā /
V03vinsutru:3877: Vin_2.2644 / tat*rūpatāyāṃ pratyayasya sadvṛttoddeśavantam upadiśya vāsaṃ tatrāvatāre niyuñjīt* /
V03vinsutru:3879: Vin_2.2646 / kalpatāpaścād āgatānām arthe punaḥ karaṇam anayoḥ /
V03vinsutru:3880: Vin_2.2647 / kāmo tra pravṛtto samyaktā cet* /
V03vinsutru:3908: Vin_2.2673 / yaḥ kaści[t*] [40b5] nānādhīṣṭho na cet tanmukhikayā nirgatiḥ /
V03vinsutru:3917: Vin_2.2682 / āstaram atra dadyāt* vālukācchayikā vā /
V03vinsutru:3922: Vin_2.2687 / nādhyeṣyamāṇo sya bhāṣaṇārthaṃ na pratīccheta /
V03vinsutru:3932: Vin_2.2696 / muhūrttaṃ sthaviro gregataṃ tūṣṇīm āga yyātra dharmaṃ bhāṣetānyam vādhīcched vada bhikṣo dharmaṃ
V03vinsutru:3933: Vin_2.2697 / bhāṣamāṇam avadhārya dharmaś ced utsāhayet* /
V03vinsutru:3935: Vin_2.2699 / gṛhiṇām a[41a2]trāgatānāṃ dharmaṃ kathaṃ kuryāt* /
V03vinsutru:3936: Vin_2.2700 / tīrthyañ ca pratyavatiṣṭhamānaṃ sunigṛhītam adarśayat kopam ananusūyam* /
V03vinsutru:3937: Vin_2.2701 / na parṣadam ādāya deśako gacchet* /
V03vinsutru:3956: Vin_2.2720 / vihārasvāmidevatārthañ ca gāthābhāṣaṇe bhikṣūṇāṃ niyogasya vacanaṃ /
V03vinsutru:3958: Vin_2.2722 / adya śuklapakṣasya pratipad vihārasvāmino vihāradevatānāṃ cārthāya gāthāṃ bhā<<ṣa>>dhvam iti /
V03vinsutru:3960: Vin_2.2724 / evaṃ nāma dānapati śvo bhikṣusaṃghaṃ bhaktenopanimantrayate taṃ bhadanta kalyā[41a5]ṇaiḥ manobhiḥ pratyanukampāntām iti /
V03vinsutru:3964: Vin_2.2728 / nāvicāryānāgamyya poṣadhaṃ śūnyo yam ita sīmānaṃ badhnīyuḥ /
V03vinsutru:3968: Vin_2.2732 / na kalpate sīmnā sīmnaḥ parikṣepaḥ /
V03vinsutru:3977: Vin_2.2741 / anuvṛddhir asya dhvasto punaḥ kṛto /
V03vinsutru:3980: Vin_2.2744 satvenaivātra na vyavahāraḥ kutaḥ saṃvardhatayā /
V03vinsutru:3981: Vin_2.2745 / nordhaṃ madhyato rdhatṛtīyayojanāntāt sīmno bandhasya rūḍhiḥ /
V03vinsutru:3988: Vin_2.2752 / yasya kasyacid atas tadārocakatvena bhavanīyatvaṃ /
V03vinsutru:3989: Vin_2.2753 / nainaṃ bahiḥsīmastho dadīta dāpayeta vā /
V03vinsutru:3993: Vin_2.2757 / nirdoṣaṃ bahiḥsīmnā nayā bhītyā nayanam* /
V03vinsutru:3994: Vin_2.2758 / bhikṣūṇāṃ gaṇanam upadhivārikeṇa poṣadhe śalākācāraṇe /
V03vinsutru:4005: Vin_2.2769 / anayas sapratyapāyatāyāṃ prāsādikasthānalobhenāsamīpe grāmasya yodhvakaraṇam* /
V03vinsutru:4006: Vin_2.2770 / karaṇam anavasthāne sārthe sya gacchatbhiḥ /
V03vinsutru:4009: Vin_2.2773 / [41b5] niravadyaṃ srāddhasya pradhānasya ca tuṣṭisaṃbhāvanāyām ācārānuśrāvaṇam* /
V03vinsutru:4026: Vin_3.6 / vihāraṃ kelāyeyuḥ daśāhārdhamāsena bhaviṣyat tāyāṃ /
V03vinsutru:4028: Vin_3.8 / pūrve hni śayanāsanasya pāta m* /
V03vinsutru:4034_0: Vin_3.11 / so ktagandhaiś cāṅgerīpaṭalakagate śukle vāsasy upanikṣiptāḥ śalākā vṛddhānte
V03vinsutru:4034_1: niveśyā yañ cāyaṃ cāsminn āvāse kriyākāro yo yusmākam utsahate tena kriyākāreṇāsminn
V03vinsutru:4034_2: āvāse varṣāvastuṃ sa śalākāṃ grihṇātu na ca vaḥ kenacid antarvarṣe saṃghamadhye raṇam
V03vinsutru:4034_3: utpā[42a2]dayitavyo yo vaḥ kasyacit kiñcij jānāti sa idānīṃ* vadanta yo ntarvarṣe
V03vinsutru:4034_4: saṃghe raṇam utpādayiṣyati tasya saṃgha uttara upaparīkṣitavyaṃ matsyata iti bhikṣūn vedayeta /
V03vinsutru:4035: Vin_3.12 / grahaṇopaśamanaṃ prati saṃghaṃ jñapayed anyaḥ /
V03vinsutru:4041: Vin_3.16 / naivāsikānā[42a3]m asy etad ante śanaiḥ sthāpanama /
V03vinsutru:4042: Vin_3.17 / gaṇayitvā pravedanam iyadbhir bhikṣubhir asminn āvāse śalākā gṛhīteti /
V03vinsutru:4045: Vin_3.18 / anta tasya tattāḍakakuñjikena purataḥ sthitvā rocanopakramaṃ
V03vinsutru:4046: sthavirāmuko vihāraḥ salābhaḥ sacīvariko gṛhāṇeti yathāguṇam* /
V03vinsutru:4049: Vin_3.19 / jñātvoddeśam astūpasaṃghārthe gatasya gantryā bhāgitvaṃ [42a4] vṛkṣamūlaharitasārdhalasthaṇḍileṣv api yathāvṛddhikoddeśaḥ /
V03vinsutru:4050: Vin_3.20 / dvādibhyo <<'>>saṃbhāvane layanasyāntato niṣyadanaprāmāṇye sya bhūmeḥ /
V03vinsutru:4055: Vin_3.25 / [42a5] naitat tv āprāptyabhāve na dadīran* /
V03vinsutru:4056: Vin_3.26 / nainam upasthāyakam vāsya karma kārayeran /
V03vinsutru:4057: Vin_3.27 / na kuṣṭhī sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanaṃ paribhuñjīta /
V03vinsutru:4059: Vin_3.29 / na sasave py atra sāṃghike tiṣṭhed āprāsādapuṣkiriṇīdvārakoṣṭhakapariṣaṇḍacaṃkramasthānavṛkṣāt* /
V03vinsutru:4062: Vin_3.32 / [42a6] pātracīvarasthāpanārtham āraṇyakebhyaḥ sarvadā layanam uddiśeyuḥ /
V03vinsutru:4063: Vin_3.33 / varṣopagamane syuḥ kecid āgantava iti vastu śayanāsanañ ca sthāpayeyuḥ /
V03vinsutru:4070: Vin_3.40 / pūrvāhṇe kvacit pāṭhasvādhyāyāvasthānacaṃkramāṇāṃ kvacid madhyāhne paratrānyatra cīvarasthāpanam āvāso paratra rātrāv ity asya yogaḥ /
V03vinsutru:4078: Vin_3.48 / nordhvam enāṃ prakrāntatvād eṣām anuvarttayeran* /
V03vinsutru:4081_0: Vin_3.51 / ayam amutrartāv ahaurātre tadavayave vā bhaviṣyaty ayam amutrāyām ācāryasya
V03vinsutru:4081_1: bhaviṣyaty ayam upādhyāyasya sā[42b3]rdham vihāriṇo yam ayam antevāsina ālaptakāder
V03vinsutru:4088: Vin_3.56 / satve nekasya vṛddhapīṭhānām apy uddeśatvaṃ /
V03vinsutru:4090: Vin_3.58 / na sāṃghikam ava[42b4]naddhaṃ nāśanadharmaṇe śucinā śrāmaṇerāya śayanāsanaṃ kaścid dadyāt* /
V03vinsutru:4092: Vin_3.60 / dānam asyai vihārasyātra vāsasampattau paryante /
V03vinsutru:4094: Vin_3.62 / na vaṣ kenacit sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanam vinā pratyāstaraṇena paribhoktavyaṃ na kalpapratyāstaraṇena na malapratyāstaraṇeneti vedayeta /
V03vinsutru:4096: Vin_3.64 / [42b5] samayam utkramya paribhuktāvāchindyād ārocya niḥśraye niḥśritasyānyasya saṃghe /
V03vinsutru:4097: Vin_3.65 / amukena dānapatināmukena vaiyyapṛtyakareṇāmukena gocaragrāmakena svaḥ saṃgho varṣā upagamiṣyatīty ārocayet* /
V03vinsutru:4105: Vin_3.69 / na yasminn abhikṣukatvam akapāṭakatvañ ca sahitam* /
V03vinsutru:4120: Vin_3.83 / laṅghayed etad bhaktabhaiṣajyopasthāyakābhāve śaktau tair vinā yāpayitum* /
V03vinsutru:4122: Vin_3.85 / anu lomikacittotpādanapāpikavāgniścāraṇayoḥ bhedāya parākramamāṇe saṃghasya /
V03vinsutru:4123: Vin_3.86 / naitac chāntyai sasambhāvano na gacchet* /
V03vinsutru:4125: Vin_3.88 / na prati<<śūtā>> varṣāvāse [43a4] nāvāsasya sambandhanam* /
V03vinsutru:4126: Vin_3.89 / na kurvīt* nāsty asyaikapoṣadhatāyām āvāsayor utthānam* /
V03vinsutru:4140: Vin_3.101 / na nāvyutsṛjya prāptapṛthivīm upanibaddhām vā bhūmisthe sthire saṃjanato ntarāpayāyitvam* /
V03vinsutru:4141: Vin_3.102 / dhvansas tad dṛśam abhiniḥsṛtyādharmapakṣasaṃkrāntāv aruṇodgatau [43a6] na saṃdigdhatāyām* /
V03vinsutru:4152: Vin_3.113 / anāśaṃkyam anākṣiptatvaṃ tīrthyasya dṛṣṭer vivecanārthaṃ jñāteḥ karaṇīyenāgamādhigamayor ātmanaḥ kāṃkṣāvinodanārthaṃ gamanāyaitatkṛteḥ /
V03vinsutru:4161: Vin_4.2 / śuddhi[43b2]m uktyor anena pratyavagatau sthūlātyayaḥ /
V03vinsutru:4165: Vin_4.6 / yataḥ prabhṛti kelāyanam iyatbhiḥ divasaiḥ saṃghasya pravāraṇā bhaviṣyati yuṣmākam ārocitam bhavatv iti /
V03vinsutru:4168: Vin_4.9 / rāhānāṃ ci[43b3]traṇaṃ stūpānāṃ moccanamolanaṃ ca /
V03vinsutru:4170: Vin_4.11 / adya sarvarātrikaṃ dharmaśravaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati tatra yuṣmābhiḥ sāmagrī deyeti gocarārocya sūtravinayamātrakadharair adhiṣṭacaturdaśyāṃ sarvarātrikadharmaśravaṇadāpanam* /
V03vinsutru:4171: Vin_4.12 / parasyāntaiḥ prākkarmato dhamyayā viniścayakathayā rātrer atināmanam* /
V03vinsutru:4185: Vin_4.25 / sarvasaṃghena prativārite etat tvasya saṃghe nivedanam* /

V03vinsutru:4195: Vin_4.32 / aśakyatāyām avasthātuṃ bhāgaprāptaṃ bhikṣum avalokayet
V03vinsutru:4202_0: / na haiva vayam āyusmann ity arthaṃ sanniṣaṇṇāḥ sannipattitāḥ kaccid āyusman* vastu
V03vinsutru:4202_1: sthāpayen na putgalam ity api tu śīlaviśuddhyarthaṃ poṣadha ukto bhagavatā dharmathiśuddhyarthaṃ
V03vinsutru:4203: Vin_4.37 / putgagalaṃ sthāpayen na na vastv iti vastu sthāpayet* putgalañ ceti
V03vinsutru:4204: abhaṅgaḥ pratīṣṭaiḥ vyapalāpe sthāpanasya pratīṣṭatāyā sthāpitasya vā /
V03vinsutru:4205: Vin_4.38 / naivaṃvidhaṃ kiñcid astītivāde mṛṣātvam atra pūrvasyāsya vā /
V03vinsutru:4206: Vin_4.39 / kalikṛtāñ cet bhikṣūṇām āganam upagatāḥ śṛṇuyuḥ dvitripoṣadhātikrāntiś cet pravārayeyuḥ /
V03vinsutru:4208: Vin_4.41 / vākyasvalpakena pratyutgamya pātracīvarapratiśamanaṃ layanam ālaṃkakūṭāgāroddeśaḥ /
V03vinsutru:4211: nam ity eṣāṃ pralobhanāni prayuñjīran* asaṃpattāv ātmībhāvasya poṣadhaṃ kurvīran* maṇḍalakeṣu /
V03vinsutru:4212: Vin_4.44 / nanu yuṣmākam adya pravāraṇeti bruvāṇā[44a4]nām āgamayatāyuṣmantāgantukā yūyaṃ naivāsikā anenārtheneti prativadeyuḥ /
V03vinsutru:4228: Vin_4.57 / saṃjñapteḥ kṣamanīyasya purastād dāpanam abhijñāna /
V03vinsutru:4239: Vin_5.2 / yathā trayam evam āstīrṇasya paraṃparabhojanam api nirdoṣaṃ gaṇabhojanaman āmantryagrāmapraveśaś cīvaravijñapanañ ca /
V03vinsutru:4266: Vin_5.29 / tasmai dadīta jñapty ādhāvanasyūtirañjaneṣv asau pūrvaṃgamaḥ syāt* /
V03vinsutru:4268: Vin_5.31 / niṣṭhitaṃ saṃpattau dvitrāṇāṃ svayaṃ sūcīpadakānāṃ dānam* /
V03vinsutru:4269: Vin_5.32 / ādānasvayaṃkṛti tad anteṣv āstā[44b4]riṣyāmy āstṛṇomy āstṛtaṃ mayeti yathāsaṃkhyaṃ cittasyotpādanam* /
V03vinsutru:4271: Vin_5.34 / śvo ham āyuṣmantaḥ kaṭhinam āstariṣyāmi yuṣmābhiḥ svakasvakāni cīvarāṇy uddhartavyāniīti sāmagryām ārocanam* /
V03vinsutru:4273: Vin_5.36 / gandhapuṣpārcitaṃ surabhidhūpadhūpita cāṃgeripaṭalakastham ekaṃ trivānekam ādāya vṛddhā[44b5]nte vasthitenāstṛtes sampādanaṃ pratipadiḥ /
V03vinsutru:4277: Vin_5.40 / pratibhikṣum agrataḥ sthitvā āstṛtamiti nivedanam /
V03vinsutru:4278: Vin_5.41 / sādhv āstṛtaṃ suṣṭhv āstṛtaṃ yo tra lābhaś cānuśaṃsaś ca so 'smākamitītaraḥ /
V03vinsutru:4281: Vin_5.44 / kālena kāla śoṣayed ātāpayet* sphoṭayet* /
V03vinsutru:4288: Vin_5.51 / dvividha uddhāraḥ svayaṃ vivartīkṛtṛmaś ca /
V03vinsutru:4289: Vin_5.52 / svayam vivṛttiḥ prāpto sīmāntarasya kaṭhinena /
V03vinsutru:4299: Vin_5.62 / traye kariṣyamāṇasyaitat saṃsthānam āśāsamucchede prārabdhanaṣṭau niṣṭhāna iti /
V03vinsutru:4301: Vin_5.64 / na karmaṇo nyaṅ kāram anu[45a2]ttiṣṭheyuḥ /
V03vinsutru:4305: Vin_5.68 / āśruter asminn ananubhūtevan taṃ pratyanuvṛttir anuśaṃse /
V03vinsutru:4308: Vin_5.71 / nānuddhṛte sarveṣāṃ tātkālikaṃ lābhaṃ bhājayet* /
V03vinsutru:4318: Vin_5.79 / kṛte py atretarair eṣām āvāse lābhe rhatvam* /
V03vinsutru:4321: Vin_5.82 / bhavati chandadānavaśāt sahitena karaṇīyasya śiṣṭaiḥ kṛtau kṛtatvam* /
V03vinsutru:4323: Vin_5.84 / tasmād a[45a4]datvā cchandaṃ svapnasamāpatyoḥ saṃniṣaṇṇe syānutthānam āstārasyoddhṛteś ca prāk śruvaṇāt* /
V03vinsutru:4326: Vin_5.87 / yat tad āstṛtya pṛthak sīmakaraṇe cāsya sthānam* /
V03vinsutru:4343: Vin_6.5 / kūsulakasaṃghakṣike ca yat tadvidhe bhikṣuṇī /
V03vinsutru:4348: Vin_6.10 / āsevakānām atra dānaṃ saṃbhavaś cet /
V03vinsutru:4351: Vin_6.13 / tatkṣaṇād evāśucimrakṣaṇaṃ sampattau śayanāsanaṃ śocayeta /
V03vinsutru:4352: Vin_6.14 / nainaṃ sāṃghikam akhaṭamaṃcapīṭhamapratyāstṛtamatenāniṣādāt saṃvaraṇaṃ vā dattāntarddhānam upabhuñjīta /
V03vinsutru:4353: Vin_6.15 / sarvañ ca citram abhūyo vinaṣṭaṃ /
V03vinsutru:4355: Vin_6.17 / dhāraṇaṃ pratyāstaraṇasya yena ekapuṭaṃ nyāyyam /
V03vinsutru:4363: Vin_6.25 / kalpate kośeyamūrṇakaṃ śānakaṃ [45b3] kṣaumakañ ca /
V03vinsutru:4372: Vin_6.34 / pañcānāṃ labheḥ bhājane karaṇam adyalābho bhājayiṣyate tatra yuṣmābhiḥ sannipatitavyam ity ārocanaṃ saṃghe /
V03vinsutru:4392: Vin_6.54 / naikatvam arddhasya suvarutā ca labdher anarhapraveśe kāraṇaṃ /
V03vinsutru:4394: Vin_6.56 / uṣitatvaṃ bahutaram uṣitasya tatkālake lābhe hānāyāsyāvṛttau mṛtyau ca /
V03vinsutru:4404: Vin_6.66 / asannidhau vā nivṛtte nimittāc cetasi /
V03vinsutru:4408: Vin_6.70 / na jñaptyādhiṣṭhite prāptasya pūrvacarameṇa vā /
V03vinsutru:4409: Vin_6.71 / kasyacit tataḥ saṃghavṛddhanavakayoḥ dānaṃ tad ākhyaṃ /
V03vinsutru:4412: Vin_6.74 / sīmāntarikāt sthalagne kāye nyatra vā yātāmā[46a3]krāntis tāvad gatānāṃ /
V03vinsutru:4421: Vin_6.83 / antargṛhasthatve pātracīvarasya yasmai gṛhapatinā dānaṃ tasyaiśitvam /
V03vinsutru:4430: Vin_6.92 / yat tena sā[46a5]rddham avasthitaṃ tasya deyatvaṃ grāhyatā vā na tasyaiva /
V03vinsutru:4432: Vin_6.94 / ratnā dīpitvaṃ saṃbhāvane yāvadbhya etat tāvatsu nāvakarmikasya viniyogaḥ samaṃ sa glānopasthāyakrātvatadgāmitvaṃ pariskāraṣaṭkasya nādhiṣṭheyatvam /
V03vinsutru:4435: Vin_6.97 / prakrāntatāyāṃ glānasya mṛtyau [46a6] tādarthye deyatvaṃ /
V03vinsutru:4439: Vin_6.101 / hāyate glānasyoktoktena dāne yathoktena dāne yathoktaṃ kāryatvaṃ /
V03vinsutru:4442: Vin_6.104 / niryātya gṛhiṇi mṛte putradārasya yathāsukhakaraṇaṃ /
V03vinsutru:4446: Vin_6.108 / sa cced anyad etat tadaṃśatvenārthiriktatve pi na ced evam eva buddhe muktānāṃ /
V03vinsutru:4456_0: Vin_6.118 / yathārham anyasya sāṃghikasya nikṣepabhājanaṃ bhojanāni kṣetragṛhāpaṇaśayanāsanāyapaskāralohanāpitakulālatakṣā
V03vinsutru:4471: Vin_6.131 / caturasrakaṃ kṛtabandhārthaṃ sūtrakāvakāśārthaṃ chidraṃ tadākhyam(a) /
V03vinsutru:4477: Vin_6.137 / na kamanamṛṣṭena citropacitreṇa vā daṇḍena /
V03vinsutru:4488: Vin_6.148 / [46b6] dhārayed asyāgṛhakaṃ nāḍikaṃ muṣṭikaṃ vā /
V03vinsutru:4491: Vin_6.151 / pāśakasyānapagamāya cīvare dānaṃ valakaṃ dattvā /
V03vinsutru:4493: Vin_6.153 / na rajakena raktam araktaṃ vā vastraṃ śocayet /
V03vinsutru:4513: Vin_6.172 / tasmād apanīya kuṇḍālake tanmātramollakasya dānaṃ /
V03vinsutru:4520: Vin_6.179 / anekapārśvakatāpair aṅgasya saṃparivarttanaṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
V03vinsutru:4521: Vin_6.180 / navaraṅgasya naveṣv eva sādhu dānam /
V03vinsutru:4527: Vin_6.186 / na medhyāṃ caṃkrame vā raṅgakarma kuryuḥ /
V03vinsutru:4533: Vin_6.192 / prastute ced vātavarṣāgamaḥ karaṇaṃ prāsāde /
V03vinsutru:4534: Vin_6.193 / praliptes tatra pradeśe kṛte karaṇaṃ /
V03vinsutru:4539: / avaśyāya pariśudhe śakyataratvaṃ hastam ardhena bhagasya /
V03vinsutru:4546: Vin_6.197 / na guruṇā sati parākrame bhāreṇākramet /
V03vinsutru:4553: Vin_6.204 / nānayaine kasya kasya cin niyuñjīt* /
V03vinsutru:4556: Vin_6.207 / tadabhūtyai tatra pradeśe vastrasyāsyāṃ dānaṃ /
V03vinsutru:4559: Vin_6.210 / kālena kālam asya śocanaṃ rañjanañ ca /
V03vinsutru:4564: Vin_6.215 / lagnasya kaṣāyodakena kṣodamiśreṇa gate ma[47b2]yitvā mandamandam apanayanaṃ pūyaśoṇitasya ca /
V03vinsutru:4565: Vin_6.216 / kālena kālam asya śocanaṃ śoṣaṇaṃ rañjanañ ca /
V03vinsutru:4567: Vin_6.218 / na yatra kvacana cīvarāṇi sthāpayet /
V03vinsutru:4572: Vin_6.223 / nidarśanam vihāre parigaṇe py etat /
V03vinsutru:4584: Vin_6.235 / dharmyayā vā kathayādhvani gacched āryeṇa vā tūṣṇīmbhāvena /
V03vinsutru:4587: Vin_6.238 / yasya tad pānīyaṃ tam uddiśya /
V03vinsutru:4591: Vin_6.242 / tatpramāṇamadhyardhaṃ śatam upādāya hastānām āśatāt /
V03vinsutru:4593: Vin_6.244 / na vinaitayā durlabhākūpapānīye deśe cāgārikāṃ caret /
V03vinsutru:4594: Vin_6.245 / prasphoṭitacīvaro dhvagaḥ [47b5] snātavāṃ prakṣālitapāṇipādo vā gṛhītapānīyaḥ poccito pānakes tricīvaraṃ prāvṛtya śānteryāpatho vihāraṃ praviśet /
V03vinsutru:4597: Vin_6.248 / prāsādikaḥ susaṃvṛter yaḥ saprabhavenāsya pratiśāmanam /
V03vinsutru:4599_0: Vin_6.250 / pidhvīyatāṃ dvāraṃ na deyaṃ mṛgayate nivāryo gṛhṇāna iti pratyā[47b6]yitasya
V03vinsutru:4599_1: pratīcchyāvyupekṣitavatopahṛtau viśvāsavastutāñ copanītena mamaivāyaṃ sahāya ityādi
V03vinsutru:4603: Vin_6.254 / nāśane yācitasyāśucinā 'saṃpatto śocādinā cittagrahaṇasya mūlyadānaḥ /
V03vinsutru:4614: Vin_6.264 / niḥśrayagrahaṇe sa ced enan niyuñjīta /
V03vinsutru:4615: Vin_6.265 / vṛddhaś cet śayanāsanasyāsya dāne tadvārikam /
V03vinsutru:4617: Vin_6.267 / pariṣaṇḍādānam antasya cīvare dhvasto pratividhānaṃ ārāpadakais tatsaṃgrahaḥ /
V03vinsutru:4618: Vin_6.268 / parivāsyābhyavakāśe vṛkṣādy upari saptāṣṭānyahāni pañcāṣātīty aparaṃ śocayitvā śavacīvaraṃ bhuñjīt* /
V03vinsutru:4619: Vin_6.269 / pravedite smaśaniko ham ity upanimantritaḥ praveśaṃ vihārakulayoḥ paribhogañ cānutsṛṣṭasvīkārasya śmaśaniko bhajet* /
V03vinsutru:4623: Vin_6.273 / ūrṇāṃ saṇaṃ karpāsaṃ natukaṃ patramañjarīñ ca /
V03vinsutru:4643: Vin_6.293 / mo[48a5]canaṃ cedyā[..]d asyauṣṭaṃ tāvato niṣkrayatvam /
V03vinsutru:4645: Vin_6.295 / vṛkṣe niryātitasyālaṅkāraś cet tasyaivotsave laṃkaraṇopasthāpanam /
V03vinsutru:4647: Vin_6.297 / na cet stambhe ca navakarmaṇe /
V03vinsutru:4662: Vin_6.312 / cakrasya darśanārthaṃ karaṇaṃ gharmavātavarṣopadraveṇāspṛṣṭyai kūpagārasya dvāravanta /
V03vinsutru:4666: Vin_6.316 / nānuddiśya dvayaṃ śāstṛpūjāyāṃ datte bhikṣuṇīnāṃ sāṃghike praveśaḥ /
V03vinsutru:4667: Vin_6.317 / pṛthagāsāmatre kasyāṃ cakro śrūyaṇe sthūlātyayaḥ /
V03vinsutru:4672: Vin_6.322 / tasyaivātra sannipātagatam anuṣṭheyaṃ saṃghasthavireṇa mūlyasya karaṇam /
V03vinsutru:4675: Vin_6.325 / niścitya punar abhūtiṃ* varddhanasya pātanam /
V03vinsutru:4681: Vin_6.331 / [48b3] datte kasyacid avibhakte vaṅgān mṛtau tadvargyagāmitvaṃ tadaṃśasya /
V03vinsutru:4682: Vin_6.332 / arhati nirvāṇāśayena pravrajitaḥ śīlavāṃ śatasāhasraṃ vastraṃ śatarasaṃbhojanaṃ pañcasūtaṃ kūṭāgāram /
V03vinsutru:4693: Vin_6.343 / maṃcasya ratnamayāde[48b5]r ayomayāt tasya parivartyā /
V03vinsutru:4694: Vin_6.344 / na kāṣṭhamayasya raṃgasya paṃcakād anyasya /
V03vinsutru:4701: Vin_6.351 / yogaṃ bhaktā chādanena pitror udvahet /
V03vinsutru:4702: Vin_6.352 / na cel lābhasya pātracīvarād atirekass amā[48b6]dāpya /
V03vinsutru:4711: Vin_6.359 / nāsāṃghāṭyāṃ chinnādhiṣṭhānaniyamaḥ nāsatve tadrūpāṇāṃ pratyayānām icchanna[49a1] / /
V03vinsutru:4721: Vin_6.367 / anyeṣāñ ca laghūnāṃ paṭapravārāṇāṃ nikaṭaromaprabhṛtīnāṃ /
V03vinsutru:4723: Vin_6.369 / na lomasya viheṭhe syānyathā prāvṛtiṃ bhajet* /
V03vinsutru:4727: Vin_6.373 / na nityam ekayaiva dhārayā caṃkramaṇaṃ /
V03vinsutru:4730: Vin_6.376 / aśakyatve gomayamradā tatraiva caṃ[49a3]krame lepanaṃ /
V03vinsutru:4734: Vin_6.380 / nāsya śaiklye sadaśāpāśātāyāṃ vā doṣaḥ /
V03vinsutru:4736: Vin_6.382 / adhiṣṭhāya tattvenānujñātā cīvaradhāraṇaṃ dhārayed uparāṃ vikalpānekam api /
V03vinsutru:4750: Vin_6.396 / gandhaiḥ parliguddhasya vāsasaḥ śocayitvā paribhogaḥ /
V03vinsutru:4755: Vin_6.401 / samyaktvaṃ saṃkhyam anuktau sāhyasya vyayacāyanikṣeptre dānam
V03vinsutru:4760: Vin_6.405 / grahaṇaṃ punar labdhau staupikasya vṛtter mū[49a6]laphalekṣubhyo nyasya bhaktārthasyoddeśopajīvyasya vā bhājyatvaṃ svīkārāya /
V03vinsutru:4771: Vin_6.416 / nānavachinnaṃ bhojanam anulābhe bhikṣuṇīnāṃ bhuktavatve tatrāpraveśaḥ /
V03vinsutru:4773: Vin_6.418 / āsanasya vṛddhānte bhikṣuṇībhiḥ sanniṣāde muktiḥ /
V03vinsutru:4774: Vin_6.419 / karaṇaṃ sabhikṣutāyām aśaktau teṣāṃ bhikṣuṇyā dakṣiṇādeśa[49b2]nasya sāmānyañ cārayiṣyatīti cārakam āhārasya pratyupasthitapādau dānāya saṃghasthaviro niyuñjīt /
V03vinsutru:4775: Vin_6.420 / yathāsaṃbhāvanam ity avalokya parṣadaṃ prabhūtyelpatve bhaktasya tadākhyānapūrvakaṃ /
V03vinsutru:4777: Vin_6.422 / na cānudghoṣite saṃprāptam iti vṛddhānta ādau gṛhṇīt /
V03vinsutru:4781: Vin_6.426 / pratidādyata ity ato nyena manasā saṃghaḥ pratigṛhṇīyāt /
V03vinsutru:4790: Vin_7.2 / pūrveṇa puṇḍakaccho nāma dāvaḥ purataḥ puṇḍavardhanasya /
V03vinsutru:4799: Vin_7.11 / sapta padāny antato gṛhiṇā paribhukte bahupuṭau api /
V03vinsutru:4814: Vin_7.26 / piṇḍībhavajjane ca janapade kholāṃ pūlāṃ ca /
V03vinsutru:4815: Vin_7.27 / na mānyasya sannidhāv upānatpravṛttim bhajeta /
V03vinsutru:4816: Vin_7.28 / na siṃ*havyāghradvīpihastyājāneyāṅgasya kiñcit kāye vasthitatvaṃ /
V03vinsutru:4817: Vin_7.29 / kakṣahastikhaṭuṃkāś ca tadanyacaṇḍamṛgān<<ṇ>>ām apy ebhir ākṣepaḥ /
V03vinsutru:4819: Vin_7.31 / udāa rdreṇa natukenaināṃ virajībhāvāya [50a1] / / pocchayet* /
V03vinsutru:4825: Vin_7.37 / na kāṣṭhapādukāyārohed anyatrāntargṛhad aśucikuṭeś ca /
V03vinsutru:4830: Vin_7.42 / atrāpy atra tadrūpeṣv api pratyayeṣv ani[50a2]pattavyatā pratigṛhṇīt tarkṣacarma cakṣuṣe /
V03vinsutru:4834: Vin_7.46 / vāte niṣadyā nipadyā ca sarvam arśaḥsvetad ity asyopayogaḥ /
V03vinsutru:4840: Vin_7.52 / [50a3] snāyvasthidantamāṃsavaṃsānām api tasyākalpikatvaṃ* yasya carmaṇaḥ /
V03vinsutru:4844: Vin_7.56 / na nābhijñāstaraṇe kṛtvā savidhānam agādhamambho vagāhet* /
V03vinsutru:4857: Vin_8.5 / tadvac chuktaśulukadadhimaṇḍodaśvinmaṇḍakāni dakabhinnāni paṭṭapariśrutāni svacchāni mukhadarśīni śarakāṇḍavarṇāni /
V03vinsutru:4858: Vin_8.6 / ayuktiḥ prāg evaṃ [pa]ścād upasaṃpannena yarśanasya sa[50a5]mānavyaṃjanena /
V03vinsutru:4865: Vin_8.13 / atattvāt taddravyasya kālikaṃ ced anupasaṃpannena marddhanaṃ pariśrāvaṇañ ca paṭena /
V03vinsutru:4870: Vin_8.18 / tadasadatiriktakālāśritāvarūḍhiprāpte tasyāṃ cāgamyatvād bhaviṣyataḥ prākṛtānām anadhiṣṭheyatāpatteḥ /
V03vinsutru:4880: Vin_8.28 / svasthatāyām āsāṃ glānyānimittaṃ pācate dānam /
V03vinsutru:4884: Vin_8.32 / candanaṃ cavikā padmakaṃ guḍūci devadāru haridrārdrakam /
V03vinsutru:4895: Vin_8.43 / tadyathā saindhavaṃ sauvarcalaṃ viṭaṃ sāmudraṃ romakam /
V03vinsutru:4898: Vin_8.46 / yāvad āptaṃ dānaṃ snātvā punarasaṃ sparṣaṃ sakṛt snānam iti kaṣāyadānam /
V03vinsutru:4901: Vin_8.49 / tadākhyaṃ punar uccāraprasrāvau stanyayānayāyināṃ vatsakānāṃ viṣe tāv upakārau /
V03vinsutru:4910: Vin_8.58 / jarakucoccārayavāścedakālopayojyatāyāṃ yācakṛtabhaiṣajyasya tadarthaṃ sphareyuḥ nānyāt paribhuñjīt /
V03vinsutru:4914: Vin_8.62 / sānye pi sadbhāvas tadadyācārasya tasmād pūrvakalpena tatsāhye pravṛttiḥ /
V03vinsutru:4915: Vin_8.63 / [50b6] nānāpannasya rūpāntaram apūrvarūpatvaṃ tasmān na visaṃpaccitasya parataḥ svakalpenākalpanam /
V03vinsutru:4916: Vin_8.64 / sampadyate prakṣālanena śaktataṇḍuleṣu pravṛttāvasthānasya svamātrasaṃkhyatā guḍasya /
V03vinsutru:4937: Vin_8.84 / svasaṃbhavatāṃ tatra bhārīkṛtya sūtaṃ vā nidhānam /
V03vinsutru:4938: Vin_8.85 / śoṣaṇataḥ kālena kālaṃ nihitasya pautyānupagatiḥ /
V03vinsutru:4941: Vin_8.88 / [51a3] anayaneta svayam upayātre vināśahetor abhāve nusaṃpannasya /
V03vinsutru:4957: Vin_8.103 / kalpikasya pūrvaṃ tāpanaṃ paścāt paribhogikasya /
V03vinsutru:4960: Vin_8.106 / maṇer loha[51a5]sya vātra nāḍīkasādhvī nāyasaḥ /
V03vinsutru:4967: Vin_8.113 / na rātrir abhyavahāre vicikitsāyām apratirūpā /
V03vinsutru:4969: Vin_8.115 / pānaṃ vicikitsāyai dhūpavartteḥ [51a6] netrikayāsya sampattiḥ /
V03vinsutru:4971: Vin_8.117 / dvādaśāṅgulā sādhvī na tīkṣṇā puruṣā vā /
V03vinsutru:4972: Vin_8.118 / sthavikāyāṃ nidhānaṃ mrakṣayitvā sarpiṣā tailena vā /
V03vinsutru:4973: Vin_8.119 / nāgadantake cīvaravaṃśe vā tasyā sthāpanam /
V03vinsutru:4983: Vin_8.129 / apetatāyāṃ paligodhasya sthitatve ca manojñasya purataḥ khādyabhojyasya mokṣaḥ /
V03vinsutru:5000: Vin_8.145 / prakṣiptabharjitayavasyāsya bhūmau nihitasya sukte tvopagatiḥ /
V03vinsutru:5007: Vin_8.152 / rakṣyas saṃsargas tasmād ūne vigatavegatāyāñ ca /
V03vinsutru:5009: Vin_8.154 / prāsādikañ ca sādhu tasmāc chuklanatrakena sūtīkaraṇam /
V03vinsutru:5012: Vin_8.157 / cikitsārthatāṃ muktve[51b5]ty aprakṛtisāvadye sarvatra śeṣaḥ /
V03vinsutru:5013: Vin_8.158 / na laśunaṃ palāṇḍuṃ gṛñjanakaṃ vā paribhuñjīta /
V03vinsutru:5015: Vin_8.160 / nopayuñjanaḥ parataś ca saptāhaṃ laśune palāṇḍau trirātram ekarātraṃ gṛñjanavihāraṃ paribhuñjīt /
V03vinsutru:5049: Vin_8.191 / nānye kasyaikasya yānāyāvihārasya kṛtyakaraṇam aprāsādikam /
V03vinsutru:5061: Vin_8.203 / tadyathā drākṣyadāḍimakharjūrākṣoṣṭau vātāma urumānarāmāpikākurumāyikānikocobabhūḥ piñcitikā[52a4]puṣkarañ ca tadākhyam /
V03vinsutru:5065: Vin_8.205 / na rājyam upārdham vāsya pratīccheta /
V03vinsutru:5074: Vin_8.214 / nāprajñāyamānāya vyayo bhayānyatare gaṇanāṃ mṛgayet /
V03vinsutru:5078: Vin_8.217 / yato nāgatiḥ śabdasya vihāre tatra kalpakāram āpanam /
V03vinsutru:5079: Vin_8.218 / deyatvaṃ bhaktasya karaṇaṃ ceta karmaṇaḥ /
V03vinsutru:5082: Vin_8.221 / nābhyām anupānapaṭṭakāc cānyat kaṃsabhājanaṃ pudgalo dhārayet /
V03vinsutru:5084: Vin_8.223 / grahaṇaṃ rakṣāyai pratipādyamānānām apy anyānāṃ samānavyañjanānām /
V03vinsutru:5097: Vin_8.236 / nāpārśvanihitatāṃ prāgāvāt pātra[52b2]sya piṇḍāya pravṛttau bhajet /
V03vinsutru:5106: Vin_8.245 / [52b3] śocanam asaṃbhave jalasya dadhyādimaṇḍena pādayoḥ /
V03vinsutru:5114: Vin_8.253 / adhiṣṭhāpakānām apahartṛtve vā karaṇam uddeśaḥ /
V03vinsutru:5116: Vin_8.255 / yathā vṛddhikayā [52b4] niṣādanāya dāpanāya ca mahāsannipāte bhikṣūṇām uddeśaḥ /
V03vinsutru:5117: Vin_8.256 / niṣadeyuḥ dvitrāvarjāṃ yatheṣṭam atra bhikṣuṇyāḥ /
V03vinsutru:5130: Vin_8.269 / na yena mantrita tato 'nyasya labdheḥ svīkāre 'sty ayuktatvam /
V03vinsutru:5132: Vin_8.271 / tad antargatavad anyopanimantraṇe niṣaṇṇasyānujñātaṃ tenānyadattam /
V03vinsutru:5134: Vin_8.273 / nāntaṃ visarjayet [52b6] dṛṣṭiśīlasampannābhyāmāntasyānyatra yathāsaṃkhyaṃ dānam atiriktasya cālopād yātrākāriṇo grahaṇam /
V03vinsutru:5136: Vin_8.275 / māt[ā]pitṛglānaputrahyāpekṣakukṣīmatībhyo vineyākāṃ kṣāpiṇḍapātaṃ spṛṣṭavate gṛhiṇe ca saṃprāptāya saṃvibhāgaś ca tatḥ karaṇam /
V03vinsutru:5141: Vin_8.280 / na nimantraṇake śraddhadeyatvena pātrādhiṣṭhāne 'syocchiṣṭāśilāṃ yathā sukhakaraṇam /
V03vinsutru:5156: Vin_8.294 / nāpareṇa sārddham ekatra bhājane bhuñjīt* /
V03vinsutru:5159: Vin_8.297 / śrāmaṇere ca sārddhaṃ paravadayoge kalpakārakānāṃ piṇḍīkṛtya dānam /
V03vinsutru:5169: Vin_8.307 / nedamito vā dehīti bhojanārtham upaviṣṭapariveṣṭāraṃ bodhayet /
V03vinsutru:5171: Vin_8.309 / tadyathā mandāgnau pakvasyāmasya dīpatāgnau glānasaṃjñām /
V03vinsutru:5191: Vin_8.329 / akṛte ced gamanapratyayaḥ parivāradānaṃ bhikṣūṇām /
V03vinsutru:5195: Vin_8.333 / nigileṣva [53b1]nāḍikokāloṅgarān dvitrānādau chorayitvā mukhaṃ nirmādya /
V03vinsutru:5197: Vin_8.335 / tasmān mukham akāle pravāritaś codgārārāme nirmādayed anyaḥ /
V03vinsutru:5200: Vin_8.338 / naitat chandaṃ vā sthāvirasya purataṣkuryāt /
V03vinsutru:5210: Vin_8.348 / adurgandhībhāvaprāṇakāsaṃbhavāya kālena kālaṃ śocanaṃ śoṣaṇañ ca /
V03vinsutru:5234: Vin_8.372 / na tatpratibaddhakāryād anyena tatsamīpe tiṣṭhet /
V03vinsutru:5248: Vin_8.386 / sāmantake duḥkhanaṃ cet pātravaibhaṅgukānāṃ dānam* /
V03vinsutru:5267: Vin_8.403 / nirdoṣaṃ śūte kukṣeḥ prāgantāt poccanamātraṃ kṛtvāsanaṃ nāto nyaḥ /
V03vinsutru:5301: Vin_9.28 / kalpikam aśaktau karmakārikāyānitīritaṃ tayā bhikṣuṇā kṛtam vacanam* /
V03vinsutru:5302: Vin_9.29 / yasmāt tūṣṇīm ity ataḥ prāk* /
V03vinsutru:5304: Vin_9.31 / na yasya kriyateḥ [54a5] tasmād asatvaṃ pūrakatvasya chandapariśuddhir vidheḥ /
V03vinsutru:5318: Vin_9.45 / vartamānasya nāto nyaibhiḥ saśrutaṃ kuryuḥ /
V03vinsutru:5326_0: Vin_9.53 / tatsīmāntargatasyārhasya pūraṇe kāyataḥ chandato vā saṃniṣāde nanupraviṣṭatvaṃ
V03vinsutru:5326_1: pratikroṣantā ca yasya tatkarma tato nyasya pratikūlaṃ cet dharmaṃ vācyutasyeryāpathāt*
V03vinsutru:5329: Vin_9.56 / aprakṛtisthatvam atra cānyatra vā karaṇīye karaṇīyakṛtau ca /
V03vinsutru:5337: Vin_9.64 / na niyamya kālaṃ paunaḥpunye nyatra vā /
V03vinsutru:5338: Vin_9.65 / dadhyur anyatra yāvad arthaṃ parihāraṃ /
V03vinsutru:5340: Vin_9.67 / yasya pūraṇe narhatva śalākācāraṇe pi tasya /
V03vinsutru:5341: Vin_9.68 / saṃghabhede sya rūḍhir anarhe na cāraṇe śalākāṇāṃ /
V03vinsutru:5349: Vin_9.74 / punaś cet taccikīrṣādhikopanam vā ca /
V03vinsutru:5351: Vin_9.76 / punar bhadantājñaptiṃ* kariṣyāmy anuśrāvaṇañ ceti /
V03vinsutru:5354: Vin_9.79 / niṣaṇṇo syotkuṭukikayā purato nirikteś ca /
V03vinsutru:5357: Vin_9.82 / masūrikādau striyāḥ [54b6] vṛddhānte nanyatantratāyāṃ saṃghe sthitasya parārthe sapraṇatam* /
V03vinsutru:5362: Vin_9.87 / pātrabhaiṣajyaṃ vāme pāṇo pratisthāpya pratichādya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā /
V03vinsutru:5367: Vin_9.90 / rohanty asānnidhye cīvarasya manasā vikalpa utsarge dhiṣṭhānañ ca nānutsṛṣṭe pūrvatra /
V03vinsutru:5374: Vin_9.97 / ādau [55a2] ca triḥpragṛhītāṃ jalitvaṃ tādarthye divasārocane ca /
V03vinsutru:5375: Vin_9.98 / aupayikam ity ante svārthaṃ vijñaptena vacanaṃ pudgalaś cet /
V03vinsutru:5377: Vin_9.100 / chandadveṣamohabhayagativirahitasya śaktasya kṛtākṛtasmaraṇe saṃmatir utsāhya /
V03vinsutru:5392: Vin_10.3 / na sīmāntarasthasya kasmiṃś cid aṅgatvam /
V03vinsutru:5394: Vin_10.5 / ubhayasthatvam ekasminn e[55a4]katra pāde parasmin paratra /
V03vinsutru:5408: Vin_10.19 / na hāsyabhāvena kasyacit sthūlam arūḍhibuddhyā bhedotkṣepayoḥ /
V03vinsutru:5410: Vin_10.21 / nānyeṣāṃ nānāsaṃvāsikebhyo barhāṇāṃ pūraṇe gaṇena jñaptivācanayoḥ /
V03vinsutru:5412: Vin_10.23 / saṃpannatvaṃ [55a6] jñaptiśrutāv asya nāvidhir bhavyarūpe pratinidhinā dūtena pravrājanam /
V03vinsutru:5423: Vin_10.33 / na bhikṣubhikṣuṇītvayor anyakarmavastupratijñapite codakena kalpayati sāṃmukhyaṃ praṇidhikaraṇam /
V03vinsutru:5425: Vin_10.35 / anaṅgam adarśane vyāghātitvāt sattvasya pratijñānam /
V03vinsutru:5430_1: ca bhikṣuśikṣāyām utkacaprakacasya saṃghe roma pātayato niḥsaraṇaṃ pravarttayataḥ
V03vinsutru:5430_2: samīcīm upadarśayato viramato nimittād avasāraṇaṃ yācite /
V03vinsutru:5438_0: Vin_10.48 / tatkṣama[55b4]ṇakam atra karmaṇaḥ sthāne 'vasāraṇaṃ prati pratītāyām[ā]pattāvapratikṛtāyām
V03vinsutru:5438_1: apratikāryāyāṃ saṃvareṇādṛṣṭim udbhāvayantam anicchantaṃ pratikṛtim anuṣṭhātum anutsṛjantaṃ
V03vinsutru:5439: Vin_10.49 / ihaivainām āpattiṃ pratikurvīthā ayam eva tv āsaṃghaḥ prasrambhayiṣyati ity evaṃ brūyyuḥ /
V03vinsutru:5450: Vin_10.60 / sannihite tatrāsrame pratideśanīyasya garhyam āyuṣmantaḥ sthānam āpanno sātmyaṃ pratideśanīyanta dharmaṃ pratide[śa]yāmi iti /
V03vinsutru:5476: Vin_10.85 / kriyamāntāyām anayos tatsaṃghāvaśeṣāpadane dhvaṃsaḥ kṛtādānayoḥ /
V03vinsutru:5479: Vin_10.88 / tasmād arūḍhasyāsya pṛthak tadānīm utthāpyatā prathamaṃ ca /
V03vinsutru:5495: Vin_10.102 / nāsāṃ manye praṇidhātṝṇām avasāraṇasya praṇihitau rūḍhiḥ /
V03vinsutru:5503: Vin_10.110 / vikṛteḥ kriyamāṇapraṇidhinā dhvaste[56a5]na ca niṣkāsya mānena bhajane bhāṇḍasya choraṇam /
V03vinsutru:5511: Vin_10.118 / anivṛttau kaler upaśāntyai prayatnād utkṣepaḥ /
V03vinsutru:5517: Vin_10.124 / udbhavo 'nyasya praṇidhiḥ nimitte tadarthābhisandhināny aprakṛtau /
V03vinsutru:5525: Vin_10.132 / pātrasasvākhyātāraṃ prati bhikṣor abhūtena pārājaikena /
V03vinsutru:5529: Vin_10.136 / na nikubjitayā tasya [56b2] gṛhān gacchet /
V03vinsutru:5534: Vin_10.141 / yat karma karaṇaṃ tadgatānāṃ nikubjitatvam /
V03vinsutru:5543: Vin_10.150 / śuddhir ekasya purato deśanena saṃghāvaśeṣato hrīmataḥ /
V03vinsutru:5553_1: kṛtaṃ ne vā kiṃ* vā kīdṛśyaṃ ceti smartum anupasaṃpa katotkṣiptayoś cānutthānaṃ pratichādasya /
V03vinsutru:5565: Vin_11.13 / śodhite vastuni sāṣānuṣṭhānam anirjñāne pratichādakālasyāsaṃvya ānany ūnatvasya saṃśrayaṇaṃ /
V03vinsutru:5570: Vin_11.18 / yāvatīṣv abhiprāyas tāvat kīmitvam atrātrānuṣṭhiteḥ /
V03vinsutru:5571: Vin_11.19 / aparimāna ity anirjñāne sya saṃśrayasaṃbahulāḥ parimānavatya iti prābhūtye /
V03vinsutru:5576: Vin_11.23 / carato paraprāksampannapraticikīrṣotpattau pṛ[tha]g* dānam ekaṃ caraṇaṃ /
V03vinsutru:5592: Vin_12.2 / yasyābhyāmakaraṇam itarair api tatra tadgatasya /
V03vinsutru:5593: Vin_12.3 / yad aparihāṇikāto nyathānena sārddham acaṃkra[57a3]maṇam /
V03vinsutru:5602: Vin_12.12 / anuddeśaḥ poṣadhe prātimokṣasya saty anyatroddeṣṭari /
V03vinsutru:5611: Vin_12.21 / [57a5] vratasya niḥsāraḥ pravartito bhavatīti manasikaraṇaṃ /
V03vinsutru:5623: Vin_12.33 / kṛte bhaktakṛtye śayanāsanasya channe gopanam* /
V03vinsutru:5629: Vin_12.39 / na ced anyasya bhikṣor adhyeṣaṇaṃ /
V03vinsutru:5640: / prāg* dvāramokṣyād vihārādau ca paryuṣitavac caritapattau /
V03vinsutru:5648: / arūḍair aprakṛtistheṣu paripāsamānāpy aśikṣācaraṇānāṃ / [end of R om.]
V03vinsutru:5653: Vin_12.50 / na yatryānye triḥprabhṛtayaḥ sarvathā tadākhyacaraṇās tatra taccaret* /
V03vinsutru:5657: Vin_12.54 / pratyahaṃ na cec ciraṃ caritavyatvaṃ /
V03vinsutru:5660: Vin_12.57 / [57b4] kalahakārakāgamanañ ca śrutvā bhayañ cedataḥ pratini[ḥ]sṛjetāṃ saṃghasannidhau pudgale vā /
V03vinsutru:5664: Vin_12.59 / chedas tadahorātrasya prakṛtisthena sārdham ekachadane parivāsikamānāsyacāriṇoḥ śayyāyāṃ bahi[ḥ]sīmni ca /
V03vinsutru:5666: Vin_12.61 / nāsannidhau tatsīmni śrāvyāṇām asyotthānaṃ nirdoṣaṃ tadaharā[57b5]gatau sīmāntare gamanam* /
V03vinsutru:5667: Vin_12.62 / na parivāsikena sārdham ekachadane pārivāsikaḥ śayīt* /
V03vinsutru:5668: Vin_12.63 / na tīrthyupanivāsasthasya tena sārdham atra doṣaḥ //
V03vinsutru:5678: Vin_13.7 / āgamaya tvam āyuṣmaṃ glānas tvam aprayojyama ity āyusmaṃ bhūteti glāno sāv ananuyojyā iti prativadeyuḥ /
V03vinsutru:5679: Vin_13.8 / anavagatasvarūpatāyāṃ kṛtasya kartur vā codanasya /
V03vinsutru:5687: Vin_13.16 / savacanīyaṃ tv āyuṣman karomi na tvaṃ yo smādāvāsādanavalokya prakramitavyam asti me āyuṣmati praṇihitaṃ vacanāyeti /
V03vinsutru:5692: Vin_13.21 / karaṇam asyatra sthāpakaiḥ sthāpitasya tena [58a2] sārdham upasāraṇaṃ /
V03vinsutru:5694: Vin_13.23 / vakṣyāmy atrāmutra vā vase mutra vā vāstuni yatra ceṣṭam ity āropya cāmattiṃ* darśayitvāparādham utsṛjanena /
V03vinsutru:5695: Vin_13.24 / śīladṛṣṭyā cārājīva vipatyā sarvasyāsya codanādeḥ kriyāyāṃ ruḍhiḥ samūlakaṃ /
V03vinsutru:5698: Vin_13.27 / kriyānimittānāṃ parasaṃlāpa[58a3]sya sānuśrāvaṇasyeti trividhaṃ śrutaṃ /
V03vinsutru:5702: Vin_13.31 / nāpoṣadhe tasya na kṛtau kṛtatve vā strītve sthāpakasyai[ka]tarasya puṃstve sthāpitatvaṃ sthāpitatā /
V03vinsutru:5710: Vin_14.1 // na nānātvāya saṃghasya prabhāviṣṇum akā[58a4]maṃ codayed unmoṭayed vā codayatvaṃ /
V03vinsutru:5711: Vin_14.2 / na yatra prativirodhas tena sārdham abhinamane samāsīta /
V03vinsutru:5714: Vin_14.5 / antaritasyānayor vihārasya deyatvaṃ grāhyatā ca /
V03vinsutru:5715: Vin_14.6 / dharme vinaye caitadvatām adharme ced abhiniveśo jñātvā saṃghasāmagrīn na vidyate /
V03vinsutru:5716: Vin_14.7 / tasmān na tad anyānāṃ saṃbhūya kṛtau karmaṇo rūḍhin na paraspareṇāvyagratvam* /
V03vinsutru:5717: Vin_14.8 / [58a5] kaliparāyaṇatva eṣā tadvipakṣasya cāvandyatvam idaṃ dharmabhiḥ /
V03vinsutru:5722: Vin_14.13 / mṛddhadvā vayam iti vadatsu yūtham api śramaṇāḥ śākyaputriyā sma ity ātmānam* [58a6] pratijānīdhve /
V03vinsutru:5723: Vin_14.14 / yeṣāṃ cedaṃ vṛttam iyaṃ vārtā kāruṇiko vaḥ śāstā yenaitad anujñātam etad api vo na prāpadyata iti prativadeyur anyatra /
V03vinsutru:5726: Vin_14.17 / nāpi sāritāām eṣāṃ sāmagyasya vinā sāmagrīlābhenotthāpanaṃ /
V03vinsutru:5735: Vin_14.24 / karmaṇaḥ kṛtāvadharmavādibhir antaḥsīmni pṛthak tadbhedo tadacittena /
V03vinsutru:5739: Vin_14.28 / sthalasthair atra sanni ced bhikṣuṇīnām acodyatvaṃ /
V03vinsutru:5750: Vin_14.39 / tat tatā yadīyasyotsaṃghe pratipādanaṃ [58b3] dvayoś ced ubhayatra /
V03vinsutru:5755: Vin_15.1 / jñapanato vā pṛthagbhāvasya dharmāt saṃghabhedaḥ /
V03vinsutru:5757: Vin_15.3 / arūḍhir asyāsaṃghaparimāṇatve bhidyamānānām asatve cānyeṣām antaḥsīmni saṃghaparisānānām adharmadharmayoḥ tathātvena pratyavagatāv ānantaryaṃ /
V03vinsutru:5764: Vin_16.2 / padārthatathātve vipratipattir varjanaṃ sāpattikā sāmagryadānaṃ karmāṇi /
V03vinsutru:5766: Vin_16.4 / anena ca śuddhidāne ca dvitīyanimittasya /
V03vinsutru:5769: Vin_16.7 / sabhyai svayam aśaktau vivaditroḥ saṃpra[58b5]tipādanam* /
V03vinsutru:5787: Vin_16.25 / samantṛtvaṃ vargasya svato saktau vyūḍhakeṣu /
V03vinsutru:5790: Vin_16.28 / tena sasthavire saprātimokṣe nyatra saṃgha upanikṣepaḥ /
V03vinsutru:5796: Vin_16.34 / varjayed asau tataḥ svīkaraṇaṃ kasyacit* /
V03vinsutru:5799_0: Vin_16.37 / anupadhūta idaṃ vadet teṣāṃ ca [59a2] āyuṣmanta alābhānālābhādurlabho
V03vinsutru:5799_1: na sulabhā ye yūyaṃ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyā kalahajātā viharata bhaṇḍanajātā
V03vinsutru:5799_2: vikṛhītā vivādam āpannām āyuṣmantaḥ kalaho mā bhaṇḍanaṃ vigraho mā vivādaḥ //
V03vinsutru:5800: nāsti dvayor yudhyato jaya ekasya jaya ekasya parājayaḥ /
V03vinsutru:5801: nāsti dvayor dhāvato jaya ekasya jaya ekasya parājaya [59a3] iti /
V03vinsutru:5802: Vin_16.38 / bahutaramatena saṃsthānam ity aparaḥ saṃpratipādanaprakāraḥ /
V03vinsutru:5805: Vin_16.41 / kharamarthipratyarthikair gṛhītatve pragāḍham* ca vyāḍhatve teṣāṃ bhedāśaṃkitāyām asya saṃsrayaṇaṃ /
V03vinsutru:5816: Vin_16.50 / tathā ced adharmaśalākādhikyasaṃpattiṃ* [59a5] manyeta na chandānupradānena sāmagrye cārayeta /
V03vinsutru:5817: Vin_16.51 / dakṣiṇena pāṇinā dharmaśalākānāṃ cāraṇakāle grahaṇaṃ vāmenetarāsāṃ /
V03vinsutru:5819: sthavire yaṃ dharmaśalākā ajihmā avaṃkā akuṭil[ā] su[va]rṇā sugandhā sukhasaṃsparśā gṛhāṇeti dvayor vācor itarāṃ mṛgaya tena prayacchet* /
V03vinsutru:5820: Vin_16.53 / yathā dharmodbhavam* [59a6] manyeta tathā cārayec channam vā vṛtaṃ vā /
V03vinsutru:5821_0: Vin_16.54 / āyusman, upādhyāyena te dharmaśalākā gṛhītā ācāryeṇa samānopādhyāyena
V03vinsutru:5821_1: samānācāryeṇāla[pta]kena na saṃlaptakena saṃstutakena sapremakena tvam api dharmaśalākaṃ
V03vinsutru:5821_2: gṛhāṇa mātretaiḥ sārdhaṃ virukṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti vā karṇamūle tantunāyaṃ /
V03vinsutru:5824: Vin_16.57 / na bhedodbhavakṣāntyā nādharmyasya na jānannayo bhaviṣyattāṃ /
V03vinsutru:5828: Vin_16.61 / caturdhā taccodanāvastukamanyānuṣṭhānavaśāt pratikṛtyanapekṣaṇād unmattakṛtena ca /
V03vinsutru:5832: Vin_16.65 / nirvikriyasavikriyaś ca dviprakāraḥ prādeśikaḥ sakalasaṃghagataś ca /
V03vinsutru:5837: Vin_16.70 / bahūnām arthe trāsaṃghe deśyānām ekena pratikaraṇaṃ /
V03vinsutru:5846: Vin_16.79 / viparyayato dharmavinayatadviparyayāṇāṃ saṃghamadhye saṃcintyeti trikānvitaṃ codakam ādṛyeran /
V03vinsutru:5848: Vin_16.81 / saṃjñapanama saṃjñapanamarentaḥ piṭakānāṃ dhārayituran evaṃvidhasya samanuyuñjīrann enaṃ bhāvaḥ pratibodhāya sthānasthāpanena /
V03vinsutru:5851: Vin_16.84 / pratijñānaṃ coditena niṣṭhā dṛṣṭasatyatve prakṛṣṭataratve ca guṇato nyasya catuṣpramāṇīkaraṇaṃ gṛhiṇo pi /
V03vinsutru:5862: Vin_16.95 / pratipato syaitad avajñānam iti ca pratyavagatāvadarśakatvapratītāyājātatvabhāvāt* /
V03vinsutru:5873: Vin_16.103 / prakrāntāv anyena dīrgharogajātasya spṛṣṭau vā /
V03vinsutru:5890: Vin_17.9 / ekasya gandhakuṭer madhye pakṣasya kartavyatā /
V03vinsutru:5896: Vin_17.15 [60a3] anujāniyur anyeṣāṃ sāṃghike vastuni saṃghāya pudgalāya vā bhikṣave vāsavastu(na)karaṇaṃ /
V03vinsutru:5899: Vin_17.18 / vyavadhyartha bhittikaraṇena svarūpe saṃrāgapratyayaṃ vihanyuḥ /
V03vinsutru:5900: Vin_17.19 / aṃjalipūraṇikayā pāyanena mātṛgrāmam anug[ṛ]hṇīta nācchinnadhārādānena /
V03vinsutru:5901: Vin_17.20 / arhastu kāla[t]v[e] ntarvarṣam ā[60a4]gato lābhe /
V03vinsutru:5906: Vin_17.25 / nirdoṣam atadarthaṃ gatasya velāprāptau vihārāntare bhojanam* /
V03vinsutru:5908: Vin_17.27 / atiriktatāyāṃ bhikṣu mātrarthād grahaṇan na vihāram avyuperan* /
V03vinsutru:5918: Vin_17.37 / darśanamatirukṣaśaraṇapṛṣṭhaṃ mā tvaṃ jvarita iti [60a6] saṃjñayā khyāpanam ity atropāya[ḥ] /
V03vinsutru:5922: Vin_17.41 / utthāyaivāsau kālyam avalokayed vihāram* caityā[ṅ]ganaṃ ca /
V03vinsutru:5923: Vin_17.42 / [..] uccāraś cet tatkṛtaḥ chorayet* prasrāvaś ced u[ddhū]ṣennakharikābhilikhitaṃ cet samaṃ kuryāt* /
V03vinsutru:5929: Vin_17.47 / dhātusāmyaṃ pṛṣṭvā sām[ī]cīkaraṇapūrvakaṃ na[ḥ]kasya grahaṇāyeryapathabhajaṇaṃ /
V03vinsutru:5943: Vin_17.61 / susvādhyāyitaṃ suparimṛṣṭaṃ niḥsaṃdhigdhaṃ kṛtvoddeśadhāraṇaṃ ca /
V03vinsutru:5955: Vin_17.69 / cāraṇe syaiṣāṃ vyāpāro bhukte ca gopane /
V03vinsutru:5964: Vin_17.76 / tat prathato bhuktvā vaṃsam ādāya kākacaṭakapāra([ta])
V03vinsutru:5983: Vin_17.91 / dvayaṃ paligodho bhakṣyamāṇena vā dantakāṣṭhād aśucinā vā tadbhūmiparikarmaṇāt* /
V03vinsutru:5984: Vin_17.92 / paligodha tatra nāgnyam ekacīvaratā cadevandane pañcamaṇḍalakena jaṃghaprapī[ḍa]nikayā ca /
V03vinsutru:5985: Vin_17.93 / na kṣut*vantaṃ jīv[e]ty abhivanded utsṛjyāntyāvayasamāgārikāṃ ca /
V03vinsutru:5992: Vin_17.98 / nāsya nirūpāpadaṃ nāma gotram vā gṛhṇīyāt* /
V03vinsutru:5997: Vin_17.102 / gamanāgamanasaṃpannava[stu]ni navakarmiko vihāraṃ prati sthāpayet* /
V03vinsutru:6001: Vin_17.106 / kāraṇam anujñāte dātrāvihārakaraṇārthād vastunas tatkaraṇabhāṇḍasya /
V03vinsutru:6004: Vin_17.109 / bhojanaṃ navakarmakeṇa tādṛśasya yādṛśyaṃ yavane /
V03vinsutru:6010: Vin_17.115 / niravadyam eṣāṃ purojitve bharasya purodveṣṭanam* /
V03vinsutru:6011: Vin_17.116 / prārabdhasya ca vṛhatto lpasya vā karaṇārthaṃ bhañjanam* /
V03vinsutru:6013: Vin_17.118 / sīrṇatānimittaṃ tulyayor api niṣṭhitayoś ca /
V03vinsutru:6021: Vin_17.126 / deyatvam ardhotthite saṃghārthañ ce[d] utthānakasya /
V03vinsutru:6022: Vin_17.127 / paścādbhaktaṃ taddāne kālo hemantaś ce[d] grīṣmaś ceti pūrvabhaktaṃ /
V03vinsutru:6070: Vin_17.171 / grahaṇāya saṃcāraṇe lohakaṇṭakānāṃ catu[61b3]ṣke py eṣu dānam /
V03vinsutru:6074: Vin_17.175 / lambanānāṃ sopānakasya karaṇam iṣṭakāmayasya sthire /
V03vinsutru:6085: Vin_17.185 / mauñje vāvalvajaḥ sāṇakaḥ kārpyāsikā iti /
V03vinsutru:6089: naṃ kledaś ca kāṣṭhasya tasmād ayomayīnāṃ /
V03vinsutru:6093: Vin_17.192 / pānīyena prāsādasyāplavanāya varṣāsu paṭṭānāṃ dānaṃ [sta]mbhāntareṣu /
V03vinsutru:6122: Vin_17.217 / aupapādukānāṃ satvānāṃ ghaṭiyaṃtravaccyavamānānām upapadyamānānāṃ ca rāgadveṣamohānāṃ pārāvatabhujaṃgasūkarākāreṇa /
V03vinsutru:6126: Vin_17.221 / ūrdhaṃ buddhasya śuklaṃ nirvāṇamaṇḍalam upadarśayet* /
V03vinsutru:6127: Vin_17.222 / gāthayo[62a3]r ārabdham iti dvayor adhastāt* /
V03vinsutru:6136: Vin_17.231 / agniśālāyāṃ mecakādi kurvatām agniṃ* ca jvālayatāṃ kumbhāṇḍaputrāṇāṃ /
V03vinsutru:6137: Vin_17.232 / dānapater dīpaṃ dhārayato devadūti yasya ca /
V03vinsutru:6138: Vin_17.233 / nānālaṃkāravibhūṣitānāṃ kalaśa[hastā]nāṃ nāgakanyakānāṃ codakaṃ dhārayantīnāṃ pānīyamaṇḍape /
V03vinsutru:6142: Vin_17.236 / na vihāre nabhyavakāśe sadhūmam agniṃ* kuryād dhārayed dhārakuṭṭime sarvaṃ /
V03vinsutru:6148: Vin_17.242 / avaśiṣṭam aṣṭamyāṃ caturdaśyāṃ ca sarvasaṃghe [62a6] gaṇḍīm ākoṭṭya dharmyayā vā kathayāryeṇa vā tūṣṇīmbhāvena /
V03vinsutru:6149: Vin_17.243 / dharmotsave sekaḥ sukumāryāś ca gomayakārṣāḥ pradānam* /
V03vinsutru:6154: Vin_17.248 / ratnārthaṃ saṃmṛṣṭāmṛṣṭayor gandhakūṭipratimācaityayaṣṭichayānāṃ cāryāṃ gāthāṃ paṭhatā laṃghaṇaṃ /
V03vinsutru:6155: Vin_17.249 / śayanā[62b1]sanasyānayor evāhnoḥ pratyavekṣaṇaṃ saṃskaraṇaṃ niḥsṛtaiḥ /
V03vinsutru:6165: Vin_17.259 / aśakyatāyāṃ cīrīkṛtya yaṣṭyām upanibadhya prasphoṭanam* /
V03vinsutru:6166: Vin_17.260 / tathāpy ayogyatve gomayamṛdāstambhasuśire kuṇyasya vā lepanam* /
V03vinsutru:6168: Vin_17.262 / na dvārakoṣṭhake prāsāde vā śayyāprajñaptiṃ kṛtvā vā dhāraṇaṃ kuryāt* /
V03vinsutru:6169: Vin_17.263 / kuryād aśadrava pratipakṣeṇārtham aṣṭamīcaturdaśai prāsāde /
V03vinsutru:6172: Vin_17.265 / kuṭimāvināśārtham* [[62b3] maṇḍalam adhaḥpādakachedaṃ kāraye[nu]ṣamuṭake cainaṃ sthāpayen natukena vā veṣṭayet* /
V03vinsutru:6184: Vin_17.275 / nāpareṇe sārdham ekatra maṃce saṃ[s]tare nyatra vā /
V03vinsutru:6185: Vin_17.276 / kalpayed asaṃbhave lajjī pṛtha[k] pratyāsthī[tyā]ntare vṛṣikāpātrasthāvikādi dattvā smṛtim upasthāpya /
V03vinsutru:6186: Vin_17.277 / na trayād ūrdhaṃ pracitiḥ sāhyena maṃcarūḍhatāṃ bhajet* /
V03vinsutru:6189: Vin_17.280 / na trivarṣāḥ pareṇāntaritena sārdham āsanasya /
V03vinsutru:6190: Vin_17.281 / bhaje[d] āntargṛhe [62b5] upādhyāyenāpy āsanābhāve smṛtim upasthāpya /
V03vinsutru:6197: Vin_17.287 / saṃcāraṇe śayanāsanasya dvau ced ekena maṃcapīṭhasya vā grahaṇam apareṇa vṛśyādeḥ /
V03vinsutru:6198: Vin_17.288 / naita[tsā]ṃghikamadayam ākarṣenniṣkarṣed dhīna tathā kuryād yathāsya
V03vinsutru:6202: Vin_17.291 / ātapanaṃ sye śoṣaṇaṃ prasphoṭanaṃ chidrer gaḍakadānam* /
V03vinsutru:6206: Vin_17.295 / aśakyapratisaṃskaraṇatāyāṃ dīpeṣu viniyogo vartikātvena ratnopayogeṣu pudgaladātṛkeṣv api /
V03vinsutru:6207: Vin_17.296 / anupayajyamānasyātra kardamena bhittistambhakavāṭasuṣireṣu ratneṣu lepanam ity anupratipattiḥ /
V03vinsutru:6210: Vin_17.299 / na śa[63a2]kyaṃ sāṃghikam apaharantaṃ dṛṣ[ṭra] na nivārayet* /
V03vinsutru:6214: Vin_17.303 / paribhuktir asaṃbhave svasthānopanayanasya sthānāntare paribhogena /
V03vinsutru:6215: Vin_17.304 / na sthānāntarīyaṃ bhaktopakaraṇalābhaṃ sthānāntare paribhuñjīt* /
V03vinsutru:6219: Vin_17.308 / nirava[d]yoṃsibhiḥ [63a3] sāṃghikasya svasyaiva nirupayojyasya tṛṇakāṣṭhasyopayogaḥ /
V03vinsutru:6229: Vin_17.318 / na saty arthini kṛtakṛtya āvṛddhi bhojyam* dhāray[e]t* /
V03vinsutru:6232: Vin_17.321 / nārthisadbhāve satyāṃ gatau sāṃghikasya paliguddhatāṃ bhajet* /
V03vinsutru:6235: Vin_17.323 / dhārayet saṃgho niṣadāṃ putrakaṃ cā[63a5]syāḥ /
V03vinsutru:6236: Vin_17.324 / nāpitabhāṇḍañ ca suktyāṃ prakṣipya bhitto sthāpanam* /
V03vinsutru:6237: Vin_17.325 / vāsī ca saparaśunakhādanādi ta[d] bhāṇḍam* /
V03vinsutru:6249: Vin_17.337 / saṃbhavaty anayor ekena vacasā dānam* /
V03vinsutru:6299: Vin_17.382 / kṛtatām atra saṃvidhānasya upadhivārikaṃ saṃghasthaviraḥ pṛcchet* /
V03vinsutru:6300: Vin_17.383 / vihāramoṣe na ced baddhatvaṃ samāyuktair upadhivārikasya dāsya /
V03vinsutru:6303: Vin_17.386 / nābaddhvā yāvad bhāvaṃ bandhanaiḥ dvāraṃ prakrāmeta /
V03vinsutru:6304: Vin_17.387 / śūnyāvāsaṃ cet praviśe sekādy anukuryāt* /
V03vinsutru:6305: Vin_17.388 / bhāṇḍaṃ viprakṛtaṃ pratiśamayet* [63b6]nirmṛjya da[kṣa]maṃ cet* /
V03vinsutru:6307: Vin_17.390 / gṛhiṇaś ced atrāgaccheyur dharmyam ebhyaṣkathām anyac ca
V03vinsutru:6325: Vin_17.403 / gṛṣme syāś cedārtham apanayaḥ pūrvasyāpi varṣāḥ svakledāntam* /
V03vinsutru:6329: Vin_17.407 / kvacid dantakā[64a2]ṣṭhabhakṣyaṇam* kvacin mukhaśocanaṃ kvacit* pādayor ity evaṃ na tatprasṛtatayā /
V03vinsutru:6335: Vin_17.411 / pṛthag pravṛttyāpi pāṭhako bahutaropasthāpanakāriṇām aśakta sānukampet* /
V03vinsutru:6340: Vin_17.414 / [64a3] asamarthaś ca smartuṃ dhāraṇāya vinayaṃ /
V03vinsutru:6352: Vin_17.424 / na buddhavacanaṃ chandasi pade krame vā tatparāyaṇatayāropya paṭhita u[d]gṛhṇītad vahiḥ [64a4] śāstrāṇi samarthaḥ parasaṃjñapane anu[t]sṛjan buddhavacanābhiyogam* /
V03vinsutru:6363: Vin_17.434 / ārṣā gāthāṃ bhāṣaṇenainām abhimukhaṃ sthitvā saṃbo[64a5]dhyachaṭāśabdenāyanaprāpto 'nugṛhṇī[tā] /
V03vinsutru:6368: Vin_17.437 / tadbhāṇḍa samutsṛjya śastrakośaṃ sūcīgṛhakaṃ melaṃdukaṃ ca /
V03vinsutru:6369: Vin_17.438 / upatiṣṭhet kuśalaś cikitsayā tīrthyaṃ puṇyabhiprāyenānabhṛtikayā /
V03vinsutru:6371: Vin_17.440 / gacchet tadrūpeṣu pratyayeṣu prativihāre sāv upadrave vyapadiśya /
V03vinsutru:6379: Vin_17.447 / dahanam asya na cet saprāṇakavraṇatvaṃ /
V03vinsutru:6393: Vin_17.460 / arhatvam asya pravrajitānāṃ kalyāṇa[ñ] cet* /
V03vinsutru:6398: Vin_17.464 / phalaparimāṇaiḥ chatrair ekādhikair asya śravakānāṃ /
V03vinsutru:6399: Vin_17.465 / tathāgatapā[rśva]deśavaivṛttatā cet tasyāṃ diśi karaṇaṃ yatraiṣāṃ
V03vinsutru:6417: Vin_17.482 / siṃ*hadhvajo makaradhvajo nāgarājadhvajo vṛṣabhadhvaja iti /
V03vinsutru:6424: Vin_17.489 / na kaṇṭakānāṃ ropa[ṇa]ṃ nāgadantakānāṃ māsasaṃyojanāya dānam uttiṣṭhati /
V03vinsutru:6426: Vin_17.491 / noparidīpadānaṃ āgārikaiṣpūjanārtham adhirohaṇam abhāve śramaṇodd[e]śaiṣpādo prakṣālya gandhodakena /
V03vinsutru:6427: Vin_17.492 / na ced anena gandhair udvartya vastreṇa vā veṣṭayitvā śāstu saṃjñāmāmukhīkṛtyārtham abhidhyāya smṛtaiḥ /
V03vinsutru:6428: Vin_17.493 / teṣām api bhikṣubhi[64b6]r evam eva /
V03vinsutru:6440: Vin_17.502 / [65a1] // navakeṣv asya prāptiḥ paṃcabhiḥ nikāyaiḥ parivāradānaṃ /
V03vinsutru:6442: Vin_17.504 / vāditreṇaitadvādyamānena sār[d]vanyena ca mahatā sa[t]kāreṇa nirāvadyaṃ vādanāya kuru kuru bhoṣ puruṣa [śāstu]ḥ pūjām ity udīraṇam* /
V03vinsutru:6444: ] sṛṅgāṭakeṣu śvaḥ paraśvo vā bhaviṣyattāyāṃ likhitasya iti buddhapraveśo bhaviṣyatīti bhujādāvāropitasya [65a2] hastiskandhe cha[tra]dhvajapatākāparivṛtasya /
V03vinsutru:6447: Vin_17.507 / dhvajair asyāḥ parivāro vedikayāveṣṭanam* lohastambheś ca /
V03vinsutru:6450: Vin_17.510 / ābharaṇapratiyuktir utsṛjya pādābharaṇaṃ karṇapūraṃ ca /
V03vinsutru:6457: Vin_17.517 / abhisārasya niḥśritais taruṇavṛddheś ca nayanam* /
V03vinsutru:6459: Vin_17.519 / pālaśamudgakasya rathe karaṇaṃ gandhasamu[dga]kena samvidhānam* /
V03vinsutru:6461: Vin_17.521 / samāptāyāṃ pūjāyāṃ nirvṛteṣu vādyeṣu viprakrānte janakāye maṇḍanāpanamanam* /
V03vinsutru:6469: dhāraṇaṃ vipravāsaṃ ca sparśam agner nivārite /
V03vinsutru:6470: bhojanaṃ bījāghātaṃ ca deśe ca harite śuciḥ //
V03vinsutru:6471: utsargaṃ vṛkṣārohaś ca śaikṣā u[65a5]ddeśāyos saha /
V03vinsutru:6475: ityādy asyāntabhāg liṅga yāñcā bhāṇḍopabhugdrava kāmopabhoga saṃvāsānād
V03vinsutru:6480: vidhāraṇaṃ saptakaṃ dve cānye dhāraṇādhiṣṭhānoddhārānuddhāra iti //
V03vinsutru:6482: hitvānuddhṛto cānuśāṭī ca dvādaśaparṣya nalaṣaṭkaṃ cīvaraṃ
V03vinsutru:6485: [65b1] jatvaṅgulitalaromachannau ca karṇakagrahaṇe bhikṣoś ca vidyāpāṭhanamocana
V03vinsutru:6487: gṛhe channe layane mañce udvarttanamaṃcaka unmuroṭikā gandhapiṇyākataḥ /
V03vinsutru:6498: jñapanaṃ sekavākyañ ca satyavākyañ ca tadyathā /
V03vinsutru:6517: sīmnaḥ sāmragra dānaṃ ca poṣadhasya ca saptakaṃ //
V03vinsutru:6524: śākyabhikṣu dharmakīrttinā sattvārthe likhitaṃ śrīmad vikramaśilām āśritya
V03vinsutru:6526: gnur chos kyi grags pas bris pa /
V03vinsutru:6527: dpal ldan 'vyri krama śi lar dpye 'sla ra va la
V03vinsutru:6530: śī la a ka ra sa bris pa (= śīlākaraṇe likhitam)
V03vinsutru:6532: gnur dha rma kir tis bris pa jo ca myiṅi mkhan vuyin /
V03vinsutru:6533: etasya dharmakīrtter vaṇanaṃ debler sro po granthe /
